title: Good Girl Eau de Parfum
description: Black and white... good girl, bad girl. Good Girl is a sensual, evocative fragrance born of the beautiful contradictions and the ever-present duality of modern women - and modern life. Both freshly light and moodily dark, this innovative fragrance captures a woman's wondrous complexity with surprising and exceptional ingredients.The sweet, alluring qualities of jasmine give Good Girl its brightness and femininity. The darker side of Good Girl is created with richly fragrant cocoa and intoxicating tonka. Almond and coffee bring Good Girl its immediate vibrancy. Tuberose, extracted in a new way that creates a rich delicacy is the fragrance's wild card, bringing fluidity and femininity. Good Girl exemplifies the effortless elegance and wit of the House of Herrera.The ultimate femme fatale fragrance with sensual jasmine and seductive tonka. It's so good to be bad.Fragrance Notes:Top - Sambac jasmine, tuberose crystal; Heart - Velvet almond; Base - Tonka bean, cocoa, coffee

title: Black Opium Eau de Parfum
description: Black Opium Eau de Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent is highly addictive. Seductively intoxicating. Like a shot of adrenaline, the rich coffee bean notes jolt the senses with a high dose of energy, becoming softer and more feminine with the white flowers of jasmine sambac. The sweet sensuality of vanilla beans wraps the fragrance into a gourmand, voluptuous signature.Fragrance Notes:Top: Vanilla bean; Heart: White flowers; Base: Black coffee

title: Light Blue Eau de Toilette
description: A fruity floral scent that speaks of sun - drenched days and nights that linger long in memory.Personality: The Contemporary SirenThe Light Blue woman is a captivating contemporary siren, enthralling all in her wake. Here is a woman no man can resist; hence she has nothing to prove.Frangrance Notes:Top: Sicilian Cedar, Apple, Bluebell; Heart: Bamboo, Jasmine, White Rose; Base: Citron wood, Amber, Musk

title: Bright Crystal Eau de Toilette
description: Versace Bright Crystal features top notes of yuzu, iced accord, and pomegranate. Mid notes of rose, peony, magnolia, acajou, and lotus flower rest atop sensual base notes of vegetal amber and musk.Fragrance Notes:Top: yuzu, iced accord, pomegranate; Heart: rose, peony, magnolia, acajou, lotus flower; Base: vegetal amber, musk

title: Viva la Juicy Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Lively fragrance features notes of wild berries and juicy mandarin followed by honeysuckle, gardenia, and jasmine. Viva La Juicy Eau de Parfum Spray by Juicy Couture finishes with notes of amber, caramel, vanilla, sandalwood, and praline.Fragrance Notes:Top: wild berries, mandarin; Heart: honeysuckle, gardenia, jasmine; Base: amber, vanilla, sandalwood, praline

title: La vie est Belle Eau de Parfum
description: La vie est Belle, French for "life is beautiful," is a statement on the world around us, infused with meaning, with both a conscience and a soul. Le vie est Belle is for the woman who lives in the present, who is filled with honesty, truth and gratitude, and who is free of social constraint, to emblazon her own unique path.La vie est Belle represents a choice - the choice to create your own path to happiness. La vie est Belle is the fragrance of joyful femininity that makes life more beautiful. Made with the most precious natural ingredients, La vie est Belle entwines the elegance of iris with the strength of patchouli and the sweetness of praline. Floral notes of sambac, jasmine and tunisian orange blossom are added in the form of sublime absolutes.In 1949, Georges Delhomme set out to create a bottle to capture the aura of a charismatic woman who radiates that indefinable "je ne sais quoi." After many sketches, Delhomme finally struck the quintessence: the grace of a smile somehow cut into glass. This design, called The Crystal Smile, would long remain in the Lancôme archives. Now, 63 years later, Lancôme reinterprets the design, creating the rounded imprint of a smile at the heart of a crystal square. The finishing touch of refinement is a pearlescent grey organza ribbon tied at the neck, forming twin wings of freedom.Fragrance Notes:Top: Iris; Heart: Patchouli     Base: Gourmand

title: Bloom Eau de Parfum
description: Capturing the spirit of the contemporary, diverse and authentic women of Gucci, Bloom is creative director Alessandro Michele's first fragrance for the House. Envisioned as a thriving garden of flowers, Bloom is created to unfold like its name.Notes of natural tuberose and jasmine leave an unexpectedly rich white floral scent on the skin. Rangoon creeper, a plant that changes color when it blooms, infuses a powdery, floral edge.Fragrance Notes: Rangoon creeper, jasmine bud, natural tuberose

title: MON PARIS Eau de Parfum
description: Yves Saint Laurent MON PARIS is a sparkling fragrance inspired by Paris, the city of intense love. Red berries and pear immediately exude sensuality and femininity. The exotic white Datura flower, the soul of the fragrance, embodies desire and seduces the senses. Finally, this modern and daring floral scent is balanced by creamy white musks and patchouli. A passionate and unforgettable whirlwind journey to Paris.Fragrance Notes:Top: Strawberry, raspberry, bergamot, calone; Heart: Pear, orange flower, jasmin sambac, white peony, datura; Base: Patchouli, white musk, ambrox, cedarwood, crystal moss

title: Romance Eau de Parfum
description: This refined scent features notes of exhilarating florals, creamy woods, and seductive musk.Fragrance Notes:Top: Sun goddess rose, yellow freesia, ginger; Heart: Lotus flower, night-blooming daylily, white violet; Base: Skin musk 2000, patchouli coeur, oakmoss

title: Happy Perfume Spray
description: A hint of citrus. A wealth of flowers. A mix of emotions. Clinique's best - selling women's fragrance interplays fresh, vibrant notes - ruby red grapefruit, bergamot - with soft, sensual ones - Hawaiian wedding flower, spring mimosa. Wear it and be happy.Fragrance Notes:Top: ruby red grapefruit; Heart: bergamot; Base: Hawaiian wedding flower, spring mimosa

title: Amazing Grace Ballet Rose Eau de Toilette
description: Only at ULTA!Amazing Grace Ballet Rose Eau de Toilette is inspired by the delicate scent of pink rose petals opening at first bloom, and the beautiful femininity of Philosophy's best-selling Amazing Grace fragrance. This captivating scent captures the quiet strength of a ballerina in a heart of delicate rose and peony, layered with sparkling lychee, and finished with woods and sheer ballet pink musk.Fragrance Notes:Top - Sparkling lychee; Mid - Delicate rose and peony; Dry - Woods and sheer ballet pink musk

title: J'adore Eau de Parfum
description: A unique bouquet of flowers, rich and generous. J'adore Eau de Parfum is a great Dior floral for women with a generous and well - balanced bouquet, and its richness is a source of inspiration. By celebrating Ylang Ylang from the Comoro. The simplicity often hides an extreme sophistication. J'adore is a perfect harmony between former and modern perfumery: the most beautiful essences and natural flower absolutes.Fragrance Notes:Top: Ylang Ylang from the Comoro Island; Heart: damascus rose essence; Base: sambac jasmine absolute.CLICK HERE to discover J'adore fragrances.

title: Viva la Juicy Glacé Eau de Parfum
description: Dazzling and effortlessly cool, she embodies the calm enchantment of her freshly frozen world. Surrounded by a warm blanket of snow - white jasmine flowers and fresh fruits encased in ice, she crystallizes the moment with Viva la Juicy Glacé. Adding a touch of sparkle to everyday life, Viva la Juicy Glacé is an invigorating scent for the girl who owns the moment with her captivating personality and luminous presence.Everything is cooler, crisper, and more concentrated when it's iced. Just like the dazzling Viva girl who adds a touch of iridescence to everyday life, Viva la Juicy Glacé transforms the expected and heightens the senses. Experience the chill of her freshly frozen world with #vivaonice.Fragrance Notes:Top: frozen mandarin, frosted cassis leaves, pear sorbet; Heart: orange blosson, jasmine de grasse, jasmine sambac; Base: vanilla, milky sandalwood, ambrox

title: MOONLIGHT Eau de Parfum
description: Be captivated by MOONLIGHT Eau de Parfum, the illuminating new fragrance from Ariana Grande. Seductive. Confident. Inspiring.Seductive and mesmerizing, the MOONLIGHT fragrance embodies Ariana's confident spirit, optimistic energy and bold stage presence. An enchanting symbol Ariana's fans know and love, MOONLIGHT illuminates your true self, celebrates your uniqueness, and makes you absolutely irresistible.Luminous and alluring like the MOONLIGHT, the new fragrance from Ariana Grande opens with sparkling rich black currant and juicy plum while the ultra-feminine heart of fluffy marshmallow and fresh peony add a captivating wink of intrigue and mystery. A final seductive touch of creamy sandalwood, black amber and sensual vanilla create an indulgent, lasting trail of addiction.Fragrance Notes:Top - Rich black currant, juicy plum; Heart - Fluffy marshmallow and fresh peony; Drydown - Creamy sandalwood, black amber and sensual vanilla

title: Amazing Grace Eau de Toilette
description: Feminine. Beautiful. Clean. Philosophy's best - selling fragrance. Amazing Grace is always appropriate, soft, and feminine. A scent that never offends and is praised by women everywhere. Amazingly clean and beautifully feminine. The fragrance opens with bergamot to greet the senses. At the heart lies irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms, and lasting musk envelops the skin with its classic beauty.Pairing Product Suggestions:Amazing Grace Firming Body Emulsion; Amazing Grace Shampoo, Bubble Bath & Shower Gel; Amazing Grace Whipped Body CrèmeFragrance Notes:Top: bergamot; Heart: muguet blossoms; Base: lasting muskCLICK HERE for Philosophy Fragrance Finder

title: Candy Eau de Parfum
description: In an explosion of pink and gold, Prada Candy takes us on a walk on the wild side showing us a new facet of Prada femininity where more is more and excess is everything.Fragrance Notes:Top: seductive joyful carefreeness, explosion of caramel; Heart: powdery sophistication, cocktail of musks; Base: vanilla sensuality, benjoin overdoseCLICK HERE to find out which Candy girl you are.

title: SWEET LIKE CANDY Eau de Parfum
description: Playful at heart wrapped in decadent desire. Inspired by Ariana's seductively sweet, fun and sexy personality, unlock your most delightful daydream, flirt with the delicious possibilities and find yourself tickled pink with temptation. A luscious burst of sugar-frosted blackberry and juicy Italian bergamot sparkle with delicious addiction, while velvety layers of crème de cassis, fluffy marshmallow and sexy vanilla blend together to leave a sexy trail.Fragrance Notes:Top (Sweet Addiction): sparkling blackberry, Italian bergamot, pear; Heart (Delightfully Dangerous): Jasmine sambac, frangipani, dewy honeysuckle; Base (Sexy Wink): Crème de cassis, marshmallow, cashmere woods, sexy vanilla

title: Happy Heart
description: Clinique Happy Heart. A wealth of flowers. A hint of warmth. A deepening of emotions. With a heart of water hyacinth, brightened with Mandarin and blond woods. Wear it and have a happy heart.Fragrance Notes:Top: flowers;  Heart: water hyacinth; Base: mandarin, blond woods

sub_title: 1.0 oz, 1.7 oz, 3.4 oz, 5.5 oz (online only supersized)
title: Euphoria for Women Eau de Parfum
description: Glamorous. Sexy. Sensual. Explore your most intimate dreams and desires with Euphoria for Women Eau de Parfum. The fantasy of black orchid creates a captivating oriental fragrance that blends exotic fruits, seductive florals and a creamy signature.      Top Notes: pomegranate, succulent persimmon     Middle Notes: sensual champaca flower, rich black orchid     Base Notes: liquid amber, black violet, cream, mahogany wood   Online Only Supersized 5.5 oz. a $138 value!

title: Modern Muse Le Rouge Gloss Eau de Parfum
description: Shine on. Be an inspiration. Modern Muse Le Rouge Gloss Eau de Parfum by Estée Lauder is a deeply seductive contrast of two accords as sexy-hot and high-shine as gloss. Succulent fruits, flowers, a hint of spice and a sensual, fearless edge of supple leather with dark woods.Fragrance Notes: Black cherry, carrot seed, mandarin, rose centifolia, pink pepper, jasmine absolute, vinyl accord, styrax, saffron, labdanum, vanilla, patchouli.

title: Acqua di Gioia Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Acqua simply meaning water in Italian, captures the inspiration of the legendary Island of Pantelleria, where the sun and earth meet and create the perfect image of the Mediterranean landscape and the deep blue-green sea. Gioia captures the essence of Joy and brings to mind happiness, serenity and a sense of optimism.  Notes:      Top notes: A mojito-inspired sensual blend of crushed mint leaves warmed by brown sugar and missed with the zest of Italian Limone.     Middle notes: Feminine floral notes emerge with joyous hints of Jasmine, dew of Peony and traces of pink pepper.     Bottom notes: The signature Mediterranean trail is rooted by the hearts of cedar wood and Labdanum.

title: Bamboo Eau de Parfum
description: Gucci Bamboo emanates the Gucci woman's diverse sides: her femininity, confidence, savvy, and strength. The fragrance represents her essence. Soft and intense at once, Gucci Bamboo's sensorial composition draws its inspiration from the Gucci woman's harmonious dichotomy. Natural and resonant ingredients create a captivating olfactory story. Woody and warm notes vibrate through the heart and base. Deep Sandalwood, heady Tahitian vanilla and unique grey amber accords strike a complementary contrast with the inherent femininity found in exotic floral notes of soft Casablanca Lilly, feminine orange blossom, and delicate Ylang Ylang.Fragrance Notes:Top: deep sandalwood, heady Tahitian vanilla; Heart: unique amber accords; Base: soft Casablanca Lilly, feminine orange blossom, and delicate Ylang Ylang

title: Daisy Dream Eau de Toilette
description: Ethereal. Free-Spirited. Luminous. Daisy Dream Eau de Toilette by Marc Jacobs is a fruity floral fragrance with a light and airy touch. Inspired by the boundless spirit of daisies and blue skies, Daisy Dream reflects Marc Jacobs's irresistible mix of intricate details, elegance and femininity for a fresh interpretation of the iconic Daisy motif.        Topnotes: Blackberry, Grapefruit, Pear     Midnotes: Jasmine, Lychee, Blue Wisteria     Basenotes: White Woods, Musks, Coconut Water

title: Online Only Shawn Mendes Signature Eau de Parfum
description: Singer, songwriter, rising star Shawn Mendes now brings his distinctive artistry to  Signature Eau de Parfum his debut fragrance for women and men. A scent that draws you in with a harmony of fresh citrus and radiant woody florals, touched with his native maple.Soulful, luminous and uplifting, it lingers in the air like a song. With undeniably addictive appeal, the fragrance is a nod to Shawn's Canadian roots with its rich and distinctive sugar maple accord heart. Opening with refreshing citrus notes, the scent evolves with an infusion of radiant florals, leaving a lasting woody impression.

title: Daisy Eau de Toilette
description: Bright. Flirtatious. Free Spirit. Enter the world of Daisy: Fresh and feminine, with a playful innocence. Always elegant, always enchanting but not too serious Daisy for Women Eau de Toilette by Marc Jacobs is a sparkling floral bouquet, spirited and fresh, wrapped in comfort and warmth.Fragrance Notes:Top: violet leaves, wild strawberries; Heart: violet petals, jasmine bouquet; Base: musk, vanilla infusion

title: Wonderlust Eau de Parfum
description: Adventure. Romance. Discovery. Wonderlust Eau de Parfum for women by Michael Kors is all about the journey. Captivating, confident, and always sexy, Wonderlust evokes a lust for life where beauty, spontaneity and sensuality are the ultimate destination. Deeply romantic, it's a fragrance inspired by the exotic, the unexpected and the unknown.A blend of luxurious blossoms mingled with delectably spiced notes, Wonderlust awakens the senses with the freshness of Italian bergamot and a tantalizing pop of pink pepper soothed by cooling almond milk. At its heart, heady notes of blushed dianthus, pure jasmine sambac absolute and buttery heliotrope melt into a warm, exotic finish of cashmeran wood, benzoin Siam and Sri Lanka sandalwood. Wonderlust's luminous gradient bottle, a study in sensual curves accented with gold, captures the chic, carefree luxury of an impromptu escape.Fragrance Notes:Top: pink peppercorn, almond milk ; Heart: dianthus, heliotrope; Base: cashmeran wood, benzoin siam, sandalwood

title: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Eau de Toilette
description: The caress of a sparkling floral. Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Eau de Toilette spray by Dior is a composition fashioned like a dress embroidered with a thousand flowers. This floral bouquet pays homage to Christian Dior's legendary passion of flowers. It glorifies the mandarin and the peony on downy notes of white musk. The peony is at the heart of this signature. Its unique trail combines the rose damascus essence with fruity notes to recreate the outstanding scent of this flower, elusive in its natural state. The beauty of Miss Dior stems from the harmonious blend of citrus, floral and woody notes, with chypre base notes. Miss Dior is a promise of love.Fragrance Notes:Top: citrus, mandarin; Heart: chypre, peony; Base: floral, woody, white muskClick Here to discover every facet of Miss Dior

title: Amazing Grace Ballet Rose Eau de Toilette Mini
description: Only at ULTA!Amazing Grace Ballet Rose Eau de Toilette is inspired by the delicate scent of pink rose petals opening at first bloom, and the beautiful femininity of Philosophy's best-selling Amazing Grace fragrance. This captivating scent captures the quiet strength of a ballerina in a heart of delicate rose and peony, layered with sparkling lychee, and finished with woods and sheer ballet pink musk.Fragrance Notes:Top - Sparkling lychee; Mid - Delicate rose and peony; Dry - Woods and sheer ballet pink musk

title: WOMAN Eau de Parfum
description: Sophisticated, sensual, confident. A scent that embodies the essence of modern femininity. A blend of blooming white florals and rich, vibrant woods. Fearless yet feminine. For the woman who strikes an alluring harmony between audacious power and feminine grace.Fragrance Notes:Top - Pear, rhubarb, blackcurrant; Middle - Tuberose, orange flower, Turkish rose; Base - Sandalwood, hazelnut, vibrant woods

title: Daisy Eau So Fresh Eau de Toilette
description: Exhilarating. Bubbly. Playful. Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau So Fresh Eau de Toilette is a reinterpretation of Daisy: More fruity, more bubbly, more fun! A floral fruity fragrance, it transports you to a place that is exhilarating, happy, and funny.Fragrance Notes:Top: natural raspberry, grapefruit, pear; Heart: violet, wild rose, apple blossom; Base: musks, cedarwood, plum

title: Love Relentlessly Eau de Parfum
description: "If I told you that I love you,would you hold it against me?"My father wrote this note to my mother,which he ran in the newspaper and signed"Love, Relentless.""My parents were the most romantic couple Ihave ever known. This fragrance is inspiredby their love story." - Tory BurchLove Relentlessly captures that euphoric feeling of falling in love. A sparkling mix: fiery pink pepper and patchouli fuse with dewy rose and addictive amber. This irresistible scent is like a love letter - encased in a jewel-shaped bottle.Fragrance Notes:Top: pink pepper, pink grapefruit, Sicilian lemon, sparkling pear, raspberry, lychee; Heart: rose essential, orris, jasmine sambac, patchouli heart, amber; Base: Australian sandalwood, vetiver, cedarwood heart, Tonka bean absolute

title: Nectar Love Eau de Parfum
description: Irresistible. Intoxicating. Addictive. Experience the allure of Nectar Love as it bottles the heart-stopping moment when eyes meet and the whole world stops. Like a bee captivated by the irresistible draw to a lush blooming flower, Nectar Love captures nature's pull of undeniable attraction. The fragrance is a floral fruity gourmand with an exclusive natural attraction extract of honeycomb and neroli that delivers an addictive dose of delicious attraction.Fragrance Notes:Top - Yellow freesia, mandarin, solar salicylates; Mid - Jasmine, muguet, mirabelle; Base - Honeycomb neroli extract

title: Pure Grace Spray Fragrance
description: Pure. Crisp. Clean. Philosophy's Pure Grace Spray represents clean, modern simplicity. It is a universal scent that will change the way you feel about fragrance. Pure, crisp and infinitely clean, the fragrance opens with a veil of water lily for  subtle freshness. The heart has the simple, modern tones of leafy greens and lasting frosted musk brings for a clean, modern finish. Infinitely clean and universal fragrance. Fresh and simple scent. Feel like you just stepped out of the shower. Change your mood by changing your fragrance.Pairing Product Suggestions:Pure Grace Body Lotion; Pure Grace Shampoo, Bath & Shower Gel; Pure Grace Whipped Body CrèmeFrangrance Notes:Top: a veil of water lily with a subtle freshness; Heart: simple, modern tones of leafy greens; Base: lasting frosted musk brings for a clean, modern finishCLICK HERE for Philosophy Fragrance Finder

title: Chloe Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Fresh, smooth, comfortable and totally addictive. A sublime powdery rose.Fragrance Notes:Top: pink peony, freesia, lychee - subtle freshness; Heart: magnolia flower, lilly of the valley, rose - sublimated femininity; Base: cedarwood, amber, honey - velvety eleganceClick here for store locations

title: Modern Muse Chic Eau de Parfum
description: Modern Muse Chic Eau de Parfum by Estée Lauder is a vivid, woody floral fragrance to capture the innate sense of style, creativity and boldness. Be an inspiration. Experience the fragrance that captures your daring, your creativity your exuberant style. A bold contrast of vivid florals and sensual ebony woods. Two distinctively different accords - Vivid Florals Accord and Striking Ebony Woods Accord - provide an intriguing dual impression. It's a true innovation in fragrance design, as complex and fascinating as the woman who inspires it.

sub_title: Tahitian Gardenia, Tuscan Blood Orange, Hawaiian Ruby Guava, French Lilac, Malibu Lemon Blossom, Indian Coconut Nectar, Island Vanilla, Sandalwood, Persian Rose
title: Spray Perfume
description: Fresh, fun, and sexy - Pacifica's fruit, floral, spice and wood fragrances are beloved. Always true to inspiration in nature, their signature blends resonate with the complex character of their exotic origins. From the essence of the air, sea, soil and leaves, each element brings life to Pacifica's distinctive blends.

title: Olympéa Eau de Parfum
description: Olympéa Eau de Parfum by Paco Rabanne is a unique olfactory adventure, at the crossroads between the sensuality of a salty vanilla accord and the freshness of floral notes.Fragrance Notes:Top: mandarin, ginger, jasmine; Heart: salted vanilla; Base: sandalwood, cashmere, ambergris

title: Sì Eau de Parfum
description: Experience Sì, by Giorgio Armani. This luminous fragrance has been created for the modern woman who's strong yet feminine, sophisticated yet charismatic. She embodies the very essence of chic Italian elegance and style.  She says YES to life! Sì to Strength Sì to Dreams Sì to Freedom Sì to Love Sì to Myself  Sì Eau de Parfum  is a modern chypre, reinvented with deep blackcurrant nectar, airy florals and musky blond wood. The scent is at first delicate, then lingers with mystery and later makes you remember her.

title: Light Blue Eau Intense Eau de Parfum
description: The new intensity of the iconic Light Blue. The deep freshness of lemon and granny smith apple is combined with woody and musky notes to create a crisp, yet warm feeling.Fragrance Notes:Top - Lemon, green apple, peach skin; Heart - Marigold, jasmine; Base - Amber woods, cedar wood, musks

title: Tory Burch Eau de Parfum
description: The first fragrance from Tory Burch captures classic elements in unexpected ways. Feminine and tomboy. Easy and polished. Floral peony and tuberose blend with crisp citrus notes of grapefruit and neroli - anchored by earthy vetiver. A bright and complex mix in a super-chic glass bottle with a signature fretwork top.The top notes open with pink grapefruit and vibrant pink pepper, blackcurrant and neroli for sparkling freshness. The heart of the fragrance has a bouquet of prized floral absolutes; peony, mimosa, jasmine and tuberose. The signature finish is inspired by masculine woods but given a modern touch of sensuality. The refinement of vetiver, cedarwood, creamy sandalwood and the silkiness of white musk.Fragrance Notes:Top - Pink grapefruit, vibrant pink pepper, blackcurrant, neroli; Mid - Peony, mimosa, jasmine, tuberose; Base - Vetiver, cedarwood, creamy sandalwood, white musk

title: Amazing Grace Eau De Parfum
description: Amazing Grace Eau de Parfum is Philosophy's best-selling fragrance in a concentrated form.  Amazing Grace is always appropriate, soft and feminine. A scent that never offends and is praised by women everywhere. Amazingly clean and beautifully feminine. The fragrance opens with bergamot to greet the senses. At the heart lies irresistibly soft, clean muguet blossoms and lasting musk envelops the skin with its classic beauty. Feel amazingly clean and beautifully feminine. Change your mood by changing your fragrance. title: COACH Eau de Parfum
description: COACH Eau de Parfum by Coach is inspired by the spontaneous energy and downtown style of New York City. A fragrance full of contrasts, opening with bright, sparkling raspberry, giving way to creamy Turkish roses, before drying down to a sensual suede musk base.The feminine oval bottle references many of Coach's iconic codes. Its spray cap is shaped like a gold turnlock, imitating the signature clasp on Coach bags. Ebony and polished metal hangtags add a distinctive finishing touch. A horse and carriage logo, an enduring symbol of Coach craftsmanship, is subtly engraved into the glass. A nod to femininity, the soft pink packaging features a pebble leather effect as a tribute to the original American leather brand.Fragrance Notes:Top: rasperry leaves; Heart: Turkish roses; Base: suede musks

title: ARI by Ariana Grande Eau de Parfum Spray
description: ARI by Ariana Grande Eau de Parfum Spray is a luscious and sexy fragrance. It opens with sparkling fruits and an ultra - feminine floralcy, passionately spun with musks, woods, and an addictive hint of marshmallow.Fragrance Notes:Top: crispy pear, pink grapefruit, juicy raspberry; Heart: soft muguet, rose buds, vanilla orchid; Base: marshmallow, creamy musk, blonde woods

title: Poison Girl Eau de Toilette
description: The new clash of sensations by Dior. Combining the freshness of the sparkling neroli with the icy orange warmed by an ultra-sensual rose from grasse, Poison Girl Eau de Toilette is a floral gourmand that seduces with a fruity floral top note and the addictive base. Its appeal to the senses plays on a bold blend between contrasting raw materials. Experience the sweet and not so nice side of Poison Girl."Poison Girl Eau de Toilette makes the most of its effects. It's a suggestive composition that retains its tender charm but also throws out cutting remarks. It blows hot and cold.""When I was a child, I used to love a typical candy from Grasse: some rose de mai petals crystalized in sugar. From this memory, I kept the taste of an irresistible flower which inspired me the insolent seduction of Poison Girl." - Francoir Demachy - Dior's Perfume CreatorFragrance Notes:Top - Sicilian sweet orange, calabrian bitter orange; Mid - Neroli, rose demai, damascan rose; Base - Vanilla, tonka bean

title: Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming Eau de Parfum
description: Bright and colorful, Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is a floral delight you return to over and over. Its top notes of tangy red berry are joyful and striking. At its heart, a sublime duet of grasse roses and damascus roses embraces a sensuous peony accord. This infinite blooming of fresh flowers is comforted in a base of white musk notes.A positive and joyful harmony for a playful and irresistible Miss Dior. "Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is an instant present  for you. It is a beautiful gift that strikes you immediately." - François Demachy, Dior Perfumer CreatorThe opening notes of red berries is tangy and striking. Raspberry, pomegranate and blackcurrant accord are heightened by the spicy teasing tingle of pink peppercorn. At its heart lie flowers that make your mouth water! The magnificent grasse rose absolute unfurls its sensual accords. It diffuses its honeyed notes. In perfect harmony with the beautifully spirited rosa damascena, the exquisite may rose embraces a radiant peony accord. The base of white musks envelops the entire composition. The freshness is constant.Fragrance Notes:Top - Red berry accord; Heart - Grasse rose absolute and peony accord; Base - White musk accordClick Here to discover every facet of Miss Dior

title: Michael Kors Collection Sexy Amber Eau de Parfum
description: Sometimes sporty. Always sexy. And never afraid to be Glam. The fragrance and body collection from Michael Kors. Three individual fragrances and a body creme take you from weekend chic to center stage. Creamy sandalwood, the sultriest and most skin-like of all the warm, woodsy notes. Wrapped in patchouli, amber and musk, with supporting floral and citrus notes.Fragrance Notes:    Amber; Sandalwood; Jasmine

title: COACH Eau de Toilette
description: COACH Eau de Toilette is a joyful, floral green fragrance paying tribute to the energy of Manhattan as the sun rises over the city. It is a scent full of contrasts, both fresh and fruity with juicy notes of pear, yet luxurious and timeless with elegant alba rose and sensual cedarwood.Fragrance Notes:Top - Pear; Heart - White Alba Rose; Dry Down - White Cedarwood

title: Fiesta Carioca Eau de Toilette
description: Live summer at your own rhythm with Escada Fiesta Carioca. Celebrate passion and 25 years of Escada fashion fragrances with a fruity floral scent that will make you feel like dancing. Summer reignites your physical and sensual side, like an appetite to dance and swing. Escada Fiesta Carioca brings a scent filled with faraway impressions.Fragrance Notes: Pretty Lady Wild Cleome from South Africa which partners this with the Brazilian maracuja and a European red raspberry, creating a smiling fruity escape in 3 continents.

title: Armani Code for Her Eau de Parfum
description: Armani Code for Women begins with top notes of Orange Flower, Ginger, Jasmine, and Seringa Flower, followed by rich base notes of Lavender Honey, Sandalwood, and Vanilla.

title: Viva la Juicy Rosé Eau de Parfum
description: Sparkling. Charming. Exuberant. Celebrate the season with Viva la Juicy Rosé Eau de Parfum, a light-hearted toast to the forever vibrant Viva girl. Dressed in sparkling pink, she experiences the world through Rosé colored glasses. This effervescent fragrance pops with fizzy citrus perfection. It sparkles in a dew of jasmine and rose honey-like blossoms for a dreamy scent that is kissed by the glow of sensual amber. Cheers!Fragrance Notes:Top - Italian mandarin, fresh William pear, jasmine petals; Mid - Rose centifolia absolute, white peony, jasmine sambac; Dry Down - Orris absolute, benzoin, ambrox

title: Ralph Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Ralph is light and sparkling scent that begins with notes of apple, citrus zest, and mandarin followed by aquatic mid notes of freesia, magnolia, and linden flower. The base features light notes of white musk and orris.

title: Eau de Parfum
description: Imagine femininity, luxury and style - bottled. Expressing an aura of strength and beauty, glamour and confidence, it is inspired by modern women. Luminous green top notes, a heart of rich and exotic tiger orchid and lingering sensual base notes of sweet toffee and Indonesian patchouli leave a sensual memory on the skin.Notes: sweet orange, pear nectar, tiger orchid, Indonesian patchouli, caramel.

title: Decadence Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Qualitative, opulent, surprising. A sensual, luxurious, woody fragrance, Decadence by Marc Jacobs embodies the spirit of irreverent glamour. Decadence is the ultimate statement maker... a decadently feminine bottle inspired by an iconic handbag shape.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Italian Plum, Iris flower, saffron     Mid - Bulgarian rose, Jasmine sambac, orris     Base - Vetiver, papyrus woods, liquid amber

title: Crystal Noir Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Crystal Noir is an exotic scent defined by a lush note of gardenia. Notes of amber, plum and cedar are also featured.

title: Be Delicious Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Be Delicious is based around a clean and fruity note of apple,  balanced by notes of rose, cucumber, orchid, and white lily. The scent closes on soft, sensual base notes of sandalwood and amber.

title: Alien Refillable Eau de Parfum
description: Bring out the inexplicable magic that lies in every woman with the radiance of Alien by MUGLER. The refillable bottle holding this elixir is reminiscent of a sacred stone. Jewel-like, its facets express the radiance of the mysterious fragrance.  Click here for store locations

title: Walk On Air Eau de Parfum
description: Walk On Air Eau de Parfum by Kate Spade New York is a unique imprint of nature; so is the Kate Spade New York woman. She takes delight in every new day. She follows her heart. She is graceful and assured and entirely insensible. She can't live without beauty or with caution. Walk on air embodies the graceful confidence and uncontainable joy of the Kate Spade New York woman in a timeless New York city full of possibility. A light, white floral mix of lily of the valley, magnolia, and crinum lily a breath of fresh airFragrance Notes:Top: linden blossom, maiden's hair fern, solomon's seal, Calabrese bergamot, tunisian neroli; Heart: lily of the valley, magnolia grandiflora, Egyptian jasmine, narcissus absolute orpur; Base: crinum lily, white iris, violet leaf absolute orpur

title: Blue Eau de Toilette
description: Ralph Lauren Blue is a rich floral fragrance that begins with brisk notes of lotus flower, peony, lilac, rose, and tuberose followed by richer mid notes of jasmine, gardenia, and muguet. The scent closes on sensual notes of sandalwood, musk and amber.

title: Brit for Her Eau de Parfum
description: Burberry Brit is a smooth fragrance that begins with notes of pear, lime and lemongrass followed by mid notes of almond and peony. The scent closes on lush notes of vanilla, amber, and tonka bean.Fragrance Notes:Top: pear, lime, lemongrass; Heart: almond, peony; Base: vanilla, amber, tonka bean

sub_title: 1.0 oz, 2.5 oz, 3.4 oz, 5.0 oz (online only supersize)
title: Beautiful Eau de Parfum
description: Romantic, tender, memorable. Like a thousand flowers in a single bouquet. With a woody warmth and a touch of citrus.Ever romantic, Beautiful by Estée Lauder is represented by a bride to symbolize the place it holds in the hearts of women everywhere. It is a tender bouquet of violets and lilies, roses and lilacs, marigold and orange blossoms. Blended with expertise and creativity, the fragrance is warmed with a rich, woody base and brightened with a touch of citrus.

title: Ciao Eau de Parfum
description: Drawing on the perpetual motion of everyday life - with its comings-and-goings and hellos and goodbyes - Ciao Vince Camuto celebrates the spontaneity and energy of a modern woman's lifestyle. The intoxicating scent reveals floral and citrus notes with a rich dry down of glowing amber and vanilla. The fruity floral fragrance is contagious and unforgettable.Fragrance Notes:Top - Tango mandarin scent trek, Italian mandarin orpur, pink grapefruit, wild strawberry, blackberry; Mid - Rose, peony, muguet, Italian honeysuckle, jasmine, passionflower scent trek; Glowing amber, cashmeran, amaro liquor, vanilla Madagascar orpur, sandalwood Australia orpur, Indonesian patchouli orpur, sylkolide (captive musk)

title: Michael for Women Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Michael by Michael Kors is a rich floral scent featuring notes of tuberose, freesia, gardenia, and white lily followed by sophisticated and sensual base notes of sandalwood, suede, amber, and musk.

title: Guilty Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Gucci takes as a catalyst its iconic entwined Gs and brings us a heroine who regards this emblem as an incitement to subvert. For this most contemporary of rebels, Gucci is the brand of sex and power. In Gucci Guilty, this woman discovers the very scent of defiance.Top Note: Mandarin, Pink Pepper; Heart Note:  Peach, Lilac, Geranium; Base Note: Ambery Notes, Patchouli, Lilac, Geranium

title: Omnia Crystalline Eau de Toilette Spray
description: BVLGARI Omnia Crystalline Eau de Toilette Spray is a radiant, gentle, graceful, and feminine fragrance. An everyday sensual crystalline scent.Fragrance Notes:Top: bamboo, nashi pear; Heart: lotus blossom; Base: balsa wood

title: Live Colorfully Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Live Colorfully Eau de Parfum Spray is the essence of Kate Spade New York in a bottle! Uniquely designed to encircle a woman as she moves through the arc of her day. Modern optimism - expresses colorfulness and brightness. The perfect layer to your wardrobe!Top: Mandarin, pink water lily, star aniseHeart: Golden gardenia, tiare' flower, coconut waterBase: Sheer amber, musk, tahitian vanilla

title: The One Eau de Parfum Spray
description: The One is a warm, oriental floral, with modern sensuality. A fragrance with a strong personality, and a contrasting golden sweetness.PERSONALITY: THE DIVAA true diva and beautiful superstar in her own right, she personifies unabashed femininity. Defiant, liberated and passionate. Her look is always spectacular and glorious. A gorgeous chameleon with a soulful heart.Top notes: Bergamot, Mandarine, Solar accord, Lychee, Peach; Heart notes: Madonna lily, exotic fruits, Jasmine, Muguet, Plum; Base notes: Vetiver, Vanilla, dry Ambery notes, Musky notes, Mossy notes

title: Burberry Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Burberry Eau de Parfum Spray is distinguished by its sexy base note, which is composed of sandalwood, amber, cedarwood, and musk to give it its soft, sensual appeal. The top notes of peach and apricot bring out the fragrance's femininity, and a tone which can only be described as exotic.Fragrance Notes:Top: peach, apricot; Heart: exotic tone; Base: sandalwood, amber, cedarwood, musk

title: Hypnotic Poison Eau de Toilette
description: The magnetic seduction of Dior heightened by sensual and captivating vanilla. The mystery of Dior's legendary forbidden fruit lives on in a magical, modern philter that blends femininity with boldness. Four contrasting facets ¿ intoxicating bitter almond and carvi, opulent sambac jasmine, mysterious jacarandra and sensuous vanilla and musk - make for a compelling, bewitching fragrance fusion. Intoxicating and extravagant. Exuding a brazen, conquering spirit, Hypnotic Poison is an intriguing oriental fragrance that breaks with convention.

title: Viva La Juicy Noir Eau de Parfum
description: Bold. Sensual. Arresting.An enticing rendition of the original best-selling fragrance, Viva la Juicy Noir embodies the woman who is dangerous in a good way. She likes her eyes smoky and her lips rouge. Unapologetic, she takes risks and gets rewarded.A rich interpretation of the signature Viva la Juicy scent, Viva la Juicy Noir highlights the succulent ripe berry notes and gourmand accents, while adding a juicy touch of honeysuckle and a sultry hint of sandalwood.Leave a lasting impression with Viva la Juicy Noir.

title: STASH Eau de Parfum
description: This addictive fragrance from Sarah Jessica Parker is an absolute rule breaker. Inspired by her own secret fragrance obsession, STASH has been shared with only a few - until now. Risk-taking and irresistible, STASH is Sarah Jessica Parker's most personal and provocative fragrance. The secret is out.Magnetic and mysterious, STASH reveals a sensuous aromatic woody fragrance that captures light and dark while merging notes of cedarwood atlas, vetiver, and pistachio. A potent play of raw, provocative ingredients wrapped with flirtatious notes, STASH is the culmination of daring and sophistication.Fragrance Notes:Top - Grapefruit zest, black pepper, sage; Heart - Cedarwood atlas, patchouli, ginger lily, pistachio; Base - Olibanum, massoia wood, vetiver, musk

title: Tender Romance Eau de Parfum
description: Created for the woman who believes in the promising hope of new love, Ralph Lauren Tender Romance Eau de Parfum celebrates the sweet and gentle moments of falling in love for the first time. Tender Romance is the first white, luminous oriental scent - a delicate caress of pure white magnolia and silky soft cashmere. This enchanting scent captures the story of an intimate, unforgettable moment.Tender Romance is designed to evoke the warmth of an affectionate embrace and the soft caress of cashmere on the skin. The innocent sensuality of Tender Romance is revealed in a luminous nude fragrance captured in the iconic Ralph Lauren Romance bottle with shimmering silver and white accents.Fragrance Notes:Top - Fresh ginger; Middle - Pure white magnolia; Base - Silky soft cashmere

title: Princess Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Vera Wang Princess begins with notes of waterlilly, lady apple, mandarin meringue, and golden apricot skin. Mid notes of ripe pink guava, Tahitian flower, wild tuberose, and dark chocolate which give way to delectable base notes of pink frosting accord, precious amber, forbidden woods, royal musk captive and chiffon vanilla.

title: MON PARIS Eau de Toilette
description: Flirty. Sensual. Feminine. Love takes flight this spring with a fresh, luminous version of the iconic Eau de Parfum.The sparkling white floral fragrance of the original MON PARIS Eau de Parfum is transformed into an ultra-luminous floral citrus. A citrus start with grapefruit and raspberry juicy notes brings about a new fruity freshness. The floral and delicate heart of white flowers from the signature Eau de Parfum is romanced by orange blossom for a light side of love.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot, grapefruit, mandarin, raspberry, blackcurrant; Middle - Datura flower, white peony, orange flower, jasmine sambac; Base - Patchouli, cashmeran, white musks

title: Yellow Diamond Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Pure sensuality, pure transparency, pure light: Once more an authentic jewel of rare beauty unveiled in a fresh and vivid floral perfume. The unmistakable glamour of Versace.

title: Cashmere Mist Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Cashmere Mist begins with a very delicate and modest blend of tuberose, lemon, cassis, and honeysuckle followed by a rich mid note of vanilla and cashmeran. Top notes fade to reveal a sensual base note blend of satinwood, sandalwood and amber.

title: Pleasures Eau de Parfum
description: Fresh as flowers after the rain, Estée Lauder pleasures perfectly captures the modern taste for light, transparent fragrances. It is a delightful sheer floral created from lilies and peonies, jasmine and Karo-Karounde blossoms, all tingling with the rare essence of exotic Baie Rose. It reflects a modern woman's desire to experience life's little pleasures every day.

title: L'Eau Eau de Toilette
description: Jimmy Choo L'Eau Eau de Toilette is an evocation of a fresh and soft caress on the skin, for a free spirited and poetic woman.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot, hibiscus flower; Heart - Nectarine, peony flower; Base - Musk, cedarwood

title: Fresh Cream Spray
description: Philosophy believes fragrance should make you smell good and feel good, and their fresh cream spray fragrance is no exception. This sweet, delicious fragrance was created to delight your senses and bring you pure joy. Fresh Cream Spray fragrance leaves skin with a delicately sweet scent, guaranteed to draw others closer yet never overwhelm. It can be worn alone or layered with other fresh cream products for a head-to-toe fresh cream scent. You'll love the way you smell!

title: Roses De Chloe Eau de Toilette
description: A bouquet of fresh cut roses. The rose immediately exudes incredible freshness derived from the top note bergamot. It is gradually joined by a heart of damascena rose essence, modernized with a magnolia accord. The trail on the skin is of white musk and amber, signature of the Chloé house. Click here for store locations

title: Prada Eau de Parfum Spray
description: This oriental amber scent begins with citrus notes of bergamot, orange, bitter orange, mandarin flower, and mimosa. Mid notes of rose, schinus molle, peru balsam, patchouli, and raspberry give way to reveal rich base notes of sandalwood, labdanum, tonka bean, vanilla, amber and musk.

title: J'adore Eau Lumière Eau de Toilette
description: François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, wanted to accentuate the luminous character of J'adore. With J'adore Eau Lumière Eau de Toilette spray, Demachy highlighted its contrasts, fine-tuned its facets, and renewed its freshness while staying true to its floral signature. A desire to fill it with even more light, joy and zest for life.Joyful top notes explode and captivate, as blood orange essence awakens the senses and wets the appetite. Neroli from Vallauris, an intense flower that casts its light and lets J'adore shine is as radiant as the white of its petals and as warm as the golden Mediterranean sun, unfurls alongside orange blossom absolute. The sweetness of magnolia, tinged with vanilla and lemon, meets the delicate and lively beauty of the base note and essence of J'adore, the damascan rose."J'adore Eau Lumière has an extraordinary temperament. There is something attractive and sparkling about it. It is an immediate explosion, a direct road to pleasure." - François DemachyFragrance Notes:Top - Blood orange essence; Heart - Neroli from Vallauris; Base - Damascena rose essence

title: au thé Blanc Eau de Parfum
description: Reassuring, comforting, and intimate. It is a luxuriously elegant expression of sensory pleasure with this au thé Blanc Eau de Parfum by Bvlgari.Fragrance Notes:Top: artemesia; Heart: white tea; Base: musk

title: Sky di Gioia Eau de Parfum
description: Sky di Gioia, the new Gioia fragrance by Giorgio Armani to reconnect with nature and feel joyful again. Sky di Gioia brings to life the energy and optimism of a new day."I'm fascinated by the dawn, with its continuously changing colours and the endless contrasts of light and shade" - Giorgio ArmaniThe scent is a blend of fruity, floral and musky notes, opening with a petaly rose that evokes a pink sky at dawn. Juicy pear and fresh lychee combined with rose and peony make Sky a sweeter take on the marine Acqua di Gioia, made soft with white musk.Fragrance Notes:Top: lychee; Heart: white musk; Base: rose

title: Angel Refillable Eau de Parfum
description: Be exhilarated with Angel with the Eau de Parfum by MUGLER. The magic of an everlasting star bottle, thanks to Refill Bottles or your perfumer's Source. Click here for store locations

title: Dolce Eau de Parfum
description: Dolce is a gentle, feminine mix of white flowers, introduced by the freshness of the Neroli leaves and defined by the White Amaryllis, a South African flower used for the first time ever in scent.  A unique and opulent combination of White Water Lily and bold White Daffodil blend perfectly with the full-bodied White Amaryllis. Dolce's elegant packaging is reminiscent of a vintage fragrance flacon. The flower stopper pays tribute to Sicilian customs and a thin black grosgrain ribbon, presented in an elegant bow, conjures images of the white shirts and bow-ties that were a signature of early Dolce & Gabbana catwalk shows.  The final, and most personal, touch: Dolce signed in a flourish of black script, a replica of Domenico Dolce's father's own signature.  Notes:      Top notes: Neroli leaves, Papaya flower     Heart notes: White Amaryllis, White Daffodil, White Water Lily     Dry down notes: Cashmeran, Musky notes, Sandalwood

title: J'adore Injoy Eau de Toilette
description: J'adore Injoy is the perfume that captures the scent of pure joy. A new, instant pleasure, an exuberant declaration of love for life: J'adore Injoy!François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, has created a salted sensation that is both original and unexpected with its daring floral-fruity-salty scent. A refreshing, salty Fleur de Sel note brightens the lively freshness of two white flowers: Madagascan ylang-ylang essence, custom-crafted in grasse, and jasmine sambac. Finished with a juicy peach note, J'adore Injoy has a singular charm that seizes the senses with its light, salty nectar."With J'adore Injoy, I created an original fruity-salty accord to make white flowers shine. This Fleur de Sel is modern in style and literally smells of joy." - François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-CreatorFleur de Sel: For J'adore Injoy, François Demachy has created an original and surprising Fleur de Sel note that seems to sit on the tip of your tongue. An instantly joyful and incisive freshness, at the border between taste and smell, that is as charming as it is compelling. Chefs know "Fleur de Sel" (literally, "salt flower") as the petal-like flakes of natural sea-salt crystals, prized for their beauty and flavor.Heart of Ylang, transformed in Grasse: At the heart of J'adore Injoy shines the heart of ylang note. Madagascan ylang-ylang flower is tropical and solar. Its essence is refined to perfection through a long, custom distillation process in grasse, the birthplace of the art and science of transforming flowers into perfume. Patiently fine-tuned to balance the striking salty note of the overall fragrance, heart of ylang is the joyful signature of J'adore Injoy.Juicy Peach: J'adore Injoy blooms with the ripe fullness of a fruity, juicy peach note. A honeyed, velvety softness that makes the fragrance even more delicious.Fragrance Notes:Top - Fleur de Sel; Heart - Ylang ylang, transformed in grasse; Base - Juicy peachCLICK HERE to discover J'adore fragrances.

title: Trésor Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Trésor begins with notes of apricot, peach, pineapple and bergamot. Mid notes of rose, heliotrope, jasmine and orris give way to sensual base notes of musk, sandalwood and vanilla.

title: Limited Edition SWEET LIKE CANDY Eau de Parfum
description: First at ULTA!Dangerously sweet and oh so irresistible. Indulge with ARIANA GRANDE's Limited Edition SWEET LIKE CANDY Eau de Parfum that is sure to make heads turn. For when you are feeling a bit more sassy, dial it up with this RED HOT fragrance the perfect indulgence to treat yourself.Fragrance Notes:Top (Dangerously Sweet): juicy red berries, Italian bergamot, pear; Heart (Irresistibly Flirtatious): red frangipani, jasmine sambac, dewy honeysuckle; Base (Seductively Tempting): sensual musks, liquid amber, crème de cassis, marshmallow, cashmere woods

title: Candy Kiss Eau de Parfum
description: Evoking thousands of kisses, the iconic lips reveal a new facet of Candy's personality. Still feminine and seductive, Candy Kiss Eau de Parfum spray is more charming and flirtatious than ever! Prada lips are Candy kisses... When Candy kisses, she kisses a thousand times! Prada Candy Kiss Eau de Parfum reveals its inimitable softness with an overdose of musks, like a scent of white cotton wrapped up with voluptu-ous orange blossom and suave vanilla. It is a super addictive musky oriental Eau de Parfum.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot/Muguet; Heart - Musk; Base - VanillaCLICK HERE to find out which Candy girl you are.

title: Skin Eau de Parfum
description: Skin Eau de Parfum by Clean captures the delicate scent of bare skin. Hints of dewy flower petals wrap around notes of pure creaminess and warm musk to evoke the simple scent of touchable skin. Enticing, fresh, pure. Clean skin at its best.Fragrance Notes:Top Notes: Sheer Honeydew, Lotus Blossom & Fresh Air Accord; Mid Notes: Dewy Petals, Aquatic Notes & Blue Rose; Base Notes: White Musks, Amber Wood & Creamy Vanilla

title: Michael Kors Collection Glam Jasmine Eau de Parfum
description: Sometimes sporty. Always sexy. And never afraid to be Glam. The fragrance and body collection from Michael Kors. Three individual fragrances and a body crème take you from weekend chic to center stage.This fragrance focuses on a bouquet of its namesake flower; Egyptian jasmine, jasmine sambac and jasmine petals. Warm woody cedar wood and sparkling citrus play supporting roles in this floral scent.Notes: Jasmine; Cassis; Sandalwood

title: Sexy Ruby Eau de Parfum
description: A jewel of a fragrance inspired by Michael's unique interpretation of seduction, strength and glamour. Where fantasy meets femininity and a woman is her sexiest. Boldly luxurious, brilliantly faceted, and mesmerizing to encounter. Magnify your sexy.Fragrance Notes:Top - Juicy raspberry, apricot nature print; Mid - Jasmine sambac; Base - Cashmere woods

title: Deep Euphoria Eau de Parfum
description: Provocative. Sensuous. Intoxicating. Deep Euphoria Eau de Parfum spray blurs the lines between fantasy and reality with its vibrant floral chypre scent. A projection of fantasies through various experiences and transformations.Fragrance Notes:Top - Cascalone; Mid - Black magic rose; Base - Musk

title: Ed Hardy for Women Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Ed Hardy for Women is a fruit floral scent with top notes of apple soufflé, mango, wild strawberry, and red grapefruit over mid notes of freesia, muguet, and linden blossom. The scent finishes on base notes of amber, musk, tonka bean and vanilla

title: Love Story Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Chloe Love Story Eau de Parfum Spray is a modern story of seduction. She wants to lock his heart. Femininity, sophistication, sensuality.      Top: Oil of orange blossom, neroli     Mid: Strephanotis jasmine, physalis     Base: Cedar wood   Click here for store locations

title: Emporio Armani Because It's You Eau de Parfum
description: Because It's You is the fragrance of a happy, delicious & sparkling woman. She is irresistible like a ripe raspberry in its perfect and most elegant naturalness when combined with neroli. Her heart is young, unabashedly feminine, fully instinctive and passionate. Her charm is immediately apparent, like the addictive and sophisticated rose absolute. She plays with her powers of seduction as vanilla mixes with musks, revealing a complex and incredibly deep sensuality.Fragrance Notes:Top - Raspberry; Middle - Rose; Base - Vanilla

title: for her Eau de Toilette
description: A journey into a heart of musc with all its multiple facets. for her Eau de Toilette by Narciso Rodriguez is a mysterious essence for an unforgettable woman graced with sophistication and femininity. The blend of floral, amber, and woody notes expresses a subtle elegance that captures the senses and leaves a timeless, tender trail.

title: Eternity Women Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Romantic. Timeless. Feminine. Eternity Women Eau de Parfum Spray by Calvin Klein was inspired by the ideal of lasting love and intimacy. This classic scent is a harmonious blend of white flowers and creamy woods.Topnotes - Freesia, mandarin, sage; Midnotes - Muguet, white lily, marigold, narcissus; Basenotes - Sandalwood, patchouli, amber

title: My Burberry Black Parfum
description: My Burberry Black Parfum spray by Burberry is made with the same codes of craftsmanship, innovation and appreciation of the iconic heritage trench coat. My Burberry Black travels back to a London garden amidst a gathering storm, heavy rain contrasting with the warm and captivating flora.Fragrance Notes:Top: sun-drenched jasmine flower, candied rose; Heart: peach nectar; Base: amber patchouli

title: Viva La Juicy Gold Couture Eau de Parfum
description: She is couture all the way. Spinning an addictive web of glamour and decadence at the center of her golden world. For her, all that glitters is gold. Her fragrance, Viva la Juicy Gold Couture. A decadent rendition of Viva la Juicy that indulges the senses with luscious wild berries, a kiss of honeysuckle and a luxurious elixir of golden amber, melted caramel, and vanilla.

title: Dolce Rosa Excelsa Eau de Parfum
description: An enchanting scent joins the floral Dolce Garden: Dolce Rosa Excelsa Eau de Parfum spray truly captures rose petals in bloom. Opening the fragrance, neroli leaves and papaya flower dissipate into a floral bouquet of white lily and white daffodil. The African dog rose is combined with the enveloping femininity of the Turkish rose absolute. The warm musky notes, cashmeran and sandalwood leave a sensual trail of light woods, earthy tones and piquant spices.  Fragrance Notes: African dog rose, Turkish rose absolute, cashmere, sandalwood.

title: Dot Eau de Parfum
description: Charming. Energetic. Upbeat. Surprising and effervescent, energetic and alive - Dot Eau de Parfum by Marc Jacobs captures a charming, upbeat spirit with timeless sophistication. Simple and straightforward in statement, exuberant and feminine in design, Dot is a colorful juicy floral Marc Jacobs creation that comes full circle with a balance of modernity and elegance. Topnotes - Red Berries, Dragonfruit, Honeysuckle; Midnotes - Jasmine, Coconut Water, Orange Blossom; Basenotes - Vanilla, Driftwood, Musk

title: Viva la Juicy Sucré Eau de Parfum
description: Treat your sweet tooth with Viva la Juicy Sucré, a fresh indulgence for the enticingly delightful Viva girl. Dripping softly with creamy icing, the fragrance takes her to a decadent patisserie. She lives in the moment without holding back and never forgets to #EatDessertFirst.The fragrance sparkles with mandarin and red currant while peach nectar flirtatiously drizzles over a nearly edible bouquet of jasmine and orange flower petals. The dry down floats in the cloud-like sweetness of vanilla and whipped cream and is topped off with a dusting of cocoa powder for tantalizing allure. Viva la Juicy Sucré is sure to induce cravings!Fragrance Notes:Top - Brazilian gardenia, mandarin, red currant; Mid - Orange flower, jasmine flower, peach nectar, almond cream; Dry Down - Cocoa bean, sandalwood, whipped cream, vanilla extract

title: for her Eau de Parfum
description: A rare weave of pink florals with hints of rose, peach pulp, soft amber, and wood. for her Eau de Parfum by Narciso Rodriguez is a glamorous, sensual, intoxicating fragrance that embodies true elegance and timeless luxury.

title: Candy Florale Eau de Toilette
description: Prada's Candy Florale Eau de Toilette fragrance is Wondrous and sophisticated, unlike any other. A myriad of floral notes come together to create a scent full of life and vitality as Candy herself.Fragrance Notes:Top - Sparkling Cedrat from Italy; Heart - A tender bouquet of Cosmos; Base - Musk, Benzoin, Caramel CLICK HERE to find out which Candy girl you are.

title: Juicy Couture Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Juicy Couture begins with sweet fruit notes of watermelon, mandarin, and passion fruit over a floral bouquet of gardenia, hyacinth, marigold, lily, and tuberose. Juicy Couture finishes on warm, sweet base notes of caramel, crème brulee, vanilla, patchouli and woods.

title: Bronze Goddess Eau de Parfum
description: The cult fragrance, now in a captivating Eau de Parfum. Bronze Goddess Eau de Parfum by Estée Lauder is a sensuous, sun-drenched blend of bergamot, warm amber, tiare flower and vanilla combined with delicious creamy coconut. It's endless summer.Fragrance Notes:Top - Italian bergamot, ginger extract SFE, mandarin; Mid - Indian jasmine sambac absolute, creamy coconut, frangipani petals; Dry - Vanilla absolute, cashmere wood, captive musk, amber

title: Sun di Gioia Eau de Parfum
description: Sun di Gioia, a Gioia fragrance by Giorgio Armani to reconnect with nature and feel joyful again. Sun di Gioia is an Eau de parfum that captures the warmth of the Mediterranean sun. Radiant and feminine, shiny and joyful...Sun di Gioia creates a salty skin scent, providing a light, blissful scent. The scent starts off with warm florals of freesia and frangipani before being enriched with milky vanilla. A touch of iris transforms this scent into an ultra-feminine and refined feel.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Bergamot, freesia, marine accord     Middle - Sambac jasmine, ylang-ylang, frangipani     Base - Coconut milk, ambrox, iris

title: 3 L'Imperatrice Eau de Toilette
description: Succulent exotic fruits and bright pink florals give way to a musky, appetite-arousing base.PERSONALITY: THE STARFlamboyant and energetic, for L’Imperatrice life is a movie and she is its heroine. All heads turn when she enters a room. Vibrant, magnetic she exudes charisma and force of character.Top notes: Rhubarb, Red Currant, Juicy Kiwi Accord; Heart notes: Pink Cyclamen, Fresh Watermelon Accord; Base notes: Musky Notes, Sandalwood, Grapefruit Wood

title: Dior Addict Eau de Parfum
description: An intense and vibrant floral oriental. Dior Addict Eau de Parfum reveals a powerful heart of jasmine sambac absolute that blossoms with soft femininity and sensuality. The base unfurls in the deep and exquisite warmth of bourbon vanilla. Dior Addict is an instant, immediate statement. It is full without being opulent and charming without being too demonstrative.

title: Midnight Romance Eau de Parfum
description: Passion burns brightest in the dark. Ralph Lauren Midnight Romance Eau de Parfum is an embrace of a sensual pink peony and mysterious black vanilla.

title: I Am Juicy Couture Eau de Parfum
description: She's irreverent and unconventional with an intense and playful sensuality that makes her unforgettable. She is bold and fearless. A glamorous rebel with an individual spirit and style that makes a statement to the world. Her fragrance declaration is: I Am Juicy Couture.  I Am Juicy Couture combines ripe, juicy fruits to open this bold and alluring scent before blending a seductive mixture of gardenia and cashmere woods. The fragrance opens with the biting succulence of bursting raspberry, freshly tart pomelo and lush passion fruit. In the heart, a narcotic temptation of gardenia, heliotrope, dreamy rose de Mai and sensual sweet pea combine. It finishes with an addictive luxuriousness of soft musks, warm cashmere woods and candied amber.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Sunny pomelo, raspberry pulp, passion fruit     Middle - Gardenia, rose de Mai, heliotrope, sweet pea     Base - Cashmere woods, captive musks, candied vanilla, ambergris

title: Candy Gloss Eau de Toilette
description: Discover Candy Gloss, the feminine fragrance from Prada, blended by Daniela Andrier under the creative direction of Miuccia Prada. Juicy, sparkling, and intensely joyful: Candy Gloss is a sensual sorbet, sweet as cherry and solar as the orange blossom. Prada Candy fragrances are delightfully addictive scents inspired by the sweetest, most gourmand facets of the Prada woman.Fragrance Notes:Top - Cherry; Heart- Blackcurrant, orange flower; Base - MuskCLICK HERE to find out which Candy girl you are.

title: Falling In Love Spray Fragrance
description: A delicious, sparkling berry scent, Falling In Love Spray Fragrance (eau de toilette) is a sensual fragrance created to embrace a woman's romantic side. Sun-ripened blackberry captivates the senses, smooth, sparkling jasmine inspires romance and vanilla melts deliciously over your skin.  CLICK HERE for Philosophy Fragrance Finder

title: La vie est Belle L'Eclat de Parfum
description: You see it in the sparkle of an eye, in the vibration of a smile. Something that French people call L'Eclat. L'Eclat is the fragrance of a luminous and never ending emotion, an invitation to share the light of happiness. Can be worn all day and layered with La Vie Est Belle classic ancillaries. Radiant, luminous, fresh.Fragrance Notes:Heart - Iris, orange blossom; Smile - Vanilla bean

title: Obsession Eau de Parfum Spray
description: An intoxicating blend of florals and spices with an earthy warm base; intensely feminine and lasting.

title: Angel MUSE Eau de Parfum
description: Cosmic explosions collide with magnetic attraction, creating an addictive scent never experienced before. Surrender to Angel MUSE by MUGLER. Fragrance notes: Grapefruit, pink peppercorn, hazelnut cream, vetiver, patchouli.Click here for store locations

title: I LOVE JUICY COUTURE Eau de Parfum
description: I don't love lightly. I don't love half-heartedly. I don't love passively. I don't love timidly. I LOVE JUICY COUTURE. With a bold new statement, the glamorous rebel is back to declare her passion for life and all things Juicy Couture. The fragrance opens with an irresistible combination of taffy apple, lively red currant and sparkling mandarin. The heart is bright with beautiful jasmine petals and pink honeysuckle. It finishes with smooth, addictive notes of patchouli and captive musks.Fragrance Notes:Top - Taffy apply, red currant, mandarin; Heart - Jasmine, pink honeysuckle; Base - Patchouli, musks

title: Miss Dior Eau de Toilette
description: The charm of a luminous and floral chypre. Charming and effervescent, Miss Dior Eau de Toilette is a luminous floral chypre scent with a hint of springtime. The beauty of Miss Dior stems from the harmonious blend of citrus, floral and woody notes, with chypre base notes. Miss Dior is a promise of love.Fragrance Notes:Top - Blood Orange Essence; Heart: Damascus rose essences, neroli essence; Base - Patchouli essenceClick Here to discover every facet of Miss Dior

title: Warm Cotton Eau de Parfum
description:
Cozy up to CLEAN Warm Cotton, a fragrance that captures the comforting scent of fresh towels pulled warm from the dryer. This crisp and nostalgic scent combines citrus freshness with comforting warmth for the perfect just-laundered scent.
Top Notes: Citrus & Verbena
Mid Notes: Fruity, Orange Flower & Marine
Base Notes: Fougere, Amber & Musk

title: L'Eau D'Issey Eau de Toilette
description: L'Eau d'Issey awakens a feeling of total beauty. L'Eau d'Issey is a pure floral with musky and woody tones. A very complex fragrance, the Eau de Toilette is made up of a wide range of floral scents including lotus, cyclamen, freesia, carnations, and white lilies, with hints of amberseed and musk.

title: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Eau de Toilette
description: Gorgeous Gardenia is a paean to the lightness of the shrub’s first blossom and the addictive richness of it in full bloom. The result is gorgeously feminine.The Gorgeous Gardenia woman exudes a sultry sensuality that is lushly enticing. Men are drawn to her as bees are to a blossoming flower.Top notes: Red berries, Pear; Heart notes: White gardenia, Frangipani Flower; Base notes: Patchouli, Brown sugar accord

title: Bronze Goddess Eau Fraîche Skinscent
description: The fragrance that worships every inch of you. The original, alluring Eau Fraîche you know and love - back for another season. A sensuous, sun-drenched blend of ergamot, warm amber, tiare flower and vanilla combined with delicious creamy coconut. All heat. All desire. All woman.

title: Alien Non-Refillable Eau de Toilette
description: Sparkle in Alien with the Eau de Toilette by MUGLER. The ephemeral pleasure of a bottle that is a precious stone with radiant, dazzling and enigmatic powers that only lives once.  Click here for store locations

title: Online Only White Tea Eau de Toilette
description: Find your moment. Exquisite. Uncomplicated. Elizabeth Arden White Tea Eau de Toilette is inspired by the simple pleasure that accompanies the first sip of tea. Exquisitely uncomplicated, this fragrance invites you to revel in the moment. A musky-woody floral, it preludes with sparkling Italian mandarin and sensual sea breeze accord. Its Zen-like heart of white tea extract, Turkish rose absolute and mate absolute Paraguay steeps in graceful femininity while madras wood, ambrette seed absolute and a trio of tranquility musks lead to a harmonious finale. For the woman who wants to immerse herself in the moment.Fragrance Notes:Top - Italian mandarin, clary sage essence, sea breeze accord, Japanese white fern; Middle - White tea extract, mate absolute Paraguay, white iris accord, Turkish rose absolute, sapucaya atmospheric; Base - Madras wood, ambrette seed absolute, Tonka bean Venezuela absolute, ambermax, a trio of tranquility musk

title: Illicit Eau de Parfum
description: Jimmy Choo Illicit Eau de Parfum is an instinctively seductive fragrance for an audacious, confident & glamorous woman. This tempting golden elixir awakens the senses, calling out to every woman who dares to live her life to the fullest. Both edgy and elegant, Jimmy Choo Illicit Eau de Parfum is truly divine.  Fragrance Notes: Modern notes of ginger flirt with feminine rose and sophisticated jasmine, effortlessly melting into the skin with a tempting trail of honey-amber.

title: Online Only Eros Pour Femme Eau de Parfum
description: Versace's Eros Pour Femme Eau de Parfum is the primal power of a woman, captured in a radiant, sensual essence. A new legend from Versace, bursting with the passion of when Eros meets his true love, Pour Femme - but who's seducing who? An invitation to surrender to desire, and to take control of life's unstoppable forces. A fragrance of strength, individuality and seduction, from artistic director Donatella Versace. Attraction, desire, passion. Eros in a perfume. An alchemy of tempting, bright and feminine notes. A refined accord of lemon and jasmine, exalted by sensual and smooth woods.Fragrance Notes:Attraction - Vibrant and precious, the Sicilian lemon and Calabrian bergamot draw attention with their glare. Delicious and inviting pomegranate grains amaze and seduce.; Desire - The jasmine infusion and the jasmine absolute Sambac convey an authentic and timeless femininity. Generous peony petals give a velvety touch, while the lemon flower brightness enhances the floral accord and recalls Versace's homeland and tradition.; Passion - The ambrox is unveiled, deep and mysterious. A voluptuous accord made by sensual woods, creamy sandalwood and heady musk, perfectly matches it. Intense and enchanting notes evoking tactile sensations are revealed.

title: Angel Eau de Parfum Refillable Flacon Bottle
description: Be exhilarated with Angel with the Eau de Parfum by MUGLER. So that you never run out of Angel when your star bottle is empty. Click here for store locations

title: Very Irresistible Eau de Toilette
description: French style and elegance meets classic, Hollywood glamour. Launched in 2003, Givenchy Very Irrésistible Eau de Toilette was inspired by the relationship between Hubert de Givenchy and his first muse, Audrey Hepburn.Feminine rose blossoms infused with the tangy edge of star anise and verbena leaf make this iconic scent a spirited alternative to the traditional floral fragrance. Surprising like rose blossoms with a fresh, tangy edge of star anise. Rose pivoine, rose centifolia, rose fantasia, rose passion, rose emotion. Eau de Toilette floral aromatic.Fragrance Notes:Top - Star anise; Heart - Rose

title: Miracle Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Miracle begins with top notes of lychee, freesia, and citron. Mid notes of magnolia, ginger, jasmine and pepper rest atop sensual base notes cedar, musk, and woods.

title: Guilty Intense Eau de Parfum Spray
description: The House of Gucci takes as a catalyst its iconic entwined Gs and brings us a heroine who regards this emblem as an incitement to subvert. Gucci's hedonist carries her challenge to a new level with Gucci Guilty Intense. Too much can never be enough for the Gucci Guilty woman, who dares herself to embrace ever more powerful sensations.Top Note: Mandarin, Pink Pepper; Heart Note: Peach, Lilac, Geranium; Base Note: Ambery Notes, Patchouli, Lilac, Geranium

title: Brit Sheer for Her Eau de Toilette
description: Brit Sheer for Her is a delicate, fresh fragrance that has opening notes of  mandarin, grapes, pineapple leaves, litchi, yuzu. The heart of this fragrance is nashi, peach blossom, pink peony, nashi. This scent closes on white musk, blond woods.Fragrance Notes:Top: mandarin, grapes, pineapple leaves, litchi, yuzu; Heart: nashi, peach blossom, pink peony, nashi; Base: white musk, blond woods

title: Candy L'Eau Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Taking freshness and joie de vivre as a starting point for new ideas, Prada's L'Eau fragrance evolved from the concept of a fictional young female character, Candy. Evoking expressions of Prada femininity, Candy appears as both alluring and unexpected, pleasure-seeking and enigmatic.The many facets of Candy's personality reflect the range of notes that come together to form Prada Candy L'Eau. Playful, elegant and indulgent, the spirit of the fragrance lies in Candy's optimistic view of the world, as she declares there is no better time than now to be alive.Blended by Daniela Andrier, the fresh and joyful sensation of Prada Candy L'Eau lies in its mix of zestful and sweetly addictive notes. High-quality ingredients combine to form this modern and sophisticated fragrance. A trinity of White Musks, Benzoin and Caramel is heightened by the presence of Citrus and Oriental floral notes, to create a vibrant ensemble.Top: The Zest of Italian Citrus Fruits: The accord of Sicilian Mandarin and organic Lemon releases an explosion of vitality to the senses. Our journey begins: the colorful top notes bringing zest and lightness to the fragrance.; Middle: The Radiance of Sweet Pea: The journey now transforms into a floral experience as the heart note of the fragrance is filled with an Oriental bouquet inspired by Sweet Pea. The quintessence of the spring flower, the Sweet Pea offers a fresh palette, bathing us in light.; Base: The Iconic Prada Candy Trinity: Pleasure and indulgence lie at the heart of the sweetly addictive trinity of White Musks, Benzoin and Caramel.CLICK HERE to find out which Candy girl you are.

title: Cashmere Mist Eau de Toilette Spray
description: A rich and sensual fragrance defined by notes of orchid, jasmine, lily and sandalwood.

title: Fleur de Parfum
description: A unique floral composition that plunges into an infusion of rose petals. Fresh notes of verbena softened by freesia, unveil a tender rose heart enlightened by cherry blossoms, and warmed with soft woods. Soft, feminine, delightful.Fragrance Notes:Top - Lemon essence, absolute verbena, freesia; Middle - Rose, cherry blossom; Base - White cedar essence, bitter almond, amber

title: L'Eau D'Issey Eau de Parfum
description: L'Eau d'Issey is a pure floral with musky and woody tones. A very complex fragrance, L'Eau d'Issey is made up of a wide range of floral scents including lotus, cyclamen, freesia, carnations and white lilies, with hints of amber seed and musk.

title: Organza Indecence Eau de Parfum
description: Created by Hubert de Givenchy as an homage to women who understand the power of seduction, Organza Indécence's deep spice, plum and wood notes exude a feminine sensuality that's both confident and bewitching.Fragrance Notes:Top - Cinnamon, mandarin; Heart - Jacaranda wood, plum; Base - Amber, patchouli

title: Lovely Eau de Parfum
description: Now a beloved classic, the debut fragrance from Sarah Jessica Parker brings together elements of innocence and refined sophistication to capture a timeless and ageless fragrance experience. Lovely is more than a fragrance - it's a touch, a dream, a feeling, a memory, a kiss. Loveliness is everywhere when your heart is open to it. Discover this classic white amber floral imbued with a modern glamour. SJP Lovely Eau de Parfum is a silky white amber fragrance that mingles graceful notes that sparkle with femininity and create a delicious dance of sophistication and sensuality. Lush lavish florals meet richly refined notes of amber and musk to deepen the experience of Lovely. A rich composition to inspire and delight.Fragrance Notes:Top - Mandarin, bergamot, rosewood, lavender, ripe apple; Heart: Patchouli, paper whites, orchid; Base: Cedar wood, white amber, sultry musk and woods

title: Gold Collection Rose Radiant Gold Eau de Parfum
description: To Michael Kors, nothing is more alluring than the rich indulgences of Gold. The ultimate symbol of luxury and glamour. The Gold Collection - three individual fragrances destined to shine in fabulous White Luminous Gold, 24K Brilliant Gold and Rose Radiant Gold.  Tantalizing and hypnotic. Rose Radiant Gold Eau de Parfum entices the senses with a spotlight on sparkling spice, textured with a charming femininity of rich florals and soft-to-touch musks.

title: Daisy Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Daisy Eau de Parfum Spray by Marc Jacobs is a more concentrated version of fresh & flirty original.

title: Ange Ou Demon le Secret Eau de Parfum
description: Experience Givenchy's best kept secret. Ange ou Démon Le Secret offers a glimpse into a fascinating realm with a scent filled with grace and elegance. The Ange ou Démon woman is dazzling and mischievous, with a hint of mystery that dwells within her. What is her secret? Who is she? Just a single mist reveals all...Floral fruity caressing.Fragrance Notes:Top - Cranberry; Heart - Tea and crystalline jasmine; Base - Blond wood

title: Womens Eau de Parfum
description: This rich scent shines a light on the luxurious and feminine essence of gardenia. Lighter notes of orchid, ginger, sandalwood and musk are also featured.

title: Aromatics Elixir
description: Intriguing non-conformist fragrance performs the role of perfume, but goes far beyond. Touches the senses and spirit in subtle, pleasing ways. With notes of rose, jasmine, ylang ylang and vetiver. For the individualist in every woman.

title: Wonderlust Sensual Essence Eau de Parfum
description: Michael Kors Wonderlust Sensual Essence Eau de Parfum is a luxurious interpretation of the original fragrance that conjures the exhilaration of new adventure. Rich, bold and alluring, this fragrance combines the juicy freshness of pear and black cherry with lush florals and a warm suede finish. Sensuous and bright, it combines the juicy freshness of Nashi pear and black cherry with a rich bouquet of orange blossom absolute and wraps it all in the warmth of suede and amber.Fragrance Notes:Top - Nashi pear; Mid - Jasmine absolute; Base - Cashmere wood

title: Bella Eau de Parfum
description: Her laugh is effervescent, her smile is intoxicating. She is radiant, magnetic, enchanting. She is Bella. Bella Eau de Parfum by Vince Camuto is a bright floral fruity fragrance. Vibrantly warm and sensually intoxicating, this sparkling floral fruity fragrance captures the seduction of beauty.  Top: Italian Bergamot, peach nectar pear & lemon ice Mid: Strawberry flower, nectarine blossoms, jasmine water Dry: Solar musk, white amber, sandalwood, blonde woods, caramelized wood

title: Angel Heavenly Star Refillable Eau de Parfum
description: The Angel skyline shines brighter than ever as another star graces the celestial stage. True to MUGLER concept and design, the Heavenly Star captures the many facets of ANGEL in a bottle more traditional in form. Its tall and sleek aesthetic will bring something new while carrying on a special legacy.Click here for store locations

title: ck2 Eau de Toilette
description: Fresh. Warm. Electric. ck2 Eau de Toilette spray by Calvin Klein is a dual-faceted scent that balances two opposing forces: the strike of spicy electric freshness and the warmth of magnetic woods.
