A signature fragrance for an urban, alternative, new freshness. Complex while cool and natural, two fragrance worlds merge together to create an exuberant, intimate and contrasted connection.

title: Amarige Eau de Toilette
description: Feminine. Ethereal. Beautiful. Amarige embodies the heart of femininity with soft, sweet notes that are truly radiant. The Amarige woman is radiant and spontaneous, with a charming smile that reflects her zest for life.Fragrance Notes:Top - Neroli, mandarin, violet leaves, rosewood, gardenia; Middle - Red fruits, ylang-ylang, acacia farnesiana; Base - Tonka bean, woods, ambergris

title: Pure Poison Eau de Parfum
description: A voluptuous musky composition based on white flowers such as orange blossoms. Once upon a time, there was a fragrance that was innocent yet captivating, sincere yet mysterious... Pure Poison incarnates seduction in its purest state by exploring its duality and irresistible alchemy. Based on orange blossom, jasmine, gardenia, amber and sandalwood, this delicate yet generous modern potion reveals the seductress within. The fragrances of the Poison line take new directions with daring provocation. They are fragrances created to surprise and astonish, to let women assert their femininity with confidence.

title: Opium Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Intriguing and completely alluring, Opium weaves its fragrant spell with notes of aromatic cloves, myrrh, patchouli, and cinnamon blended with the deep, almost musky sweetness of plum merged with peach. Give in to the power of this well-loved fragrance.

title: My Burberry Eau de Parfum
description: Inspired by the trench coat and its heritage of British design and craftsmanship, My Burberry captures the fragrance of a London garden after the rain. The scent is a contemporary British grand floral and features a delicate heart of rose, woven with an unexpected touch of geranium leaf.Fragrance Notes:Top: sweet pea and bergamot oil. The oil is sourced from Calabria in Italy and extracted from the fresh rind by cold expression.; Heart: golden quince and freesia with a dash of geranium oil. The oil is sourced from Morocco and Egypt, extracted from the plant by steam distillation.; Base: rose absolute and patchouli oil. The oil is sourced from Malaysia and Indonesia and obtained by steam distillation.

title: Eros Pour Femme Eau de Toilette
description: The primal power of a woman, captured in a radiant, sensual essence. A new legend from Versace, bursting with the passion of when Eros meets his true love, Pour Femme - but who's seducing who? An invitation to surrender to desire, and to take control of life's unstoppable forces. Eros Pour Femme Eau de Toilette is a sensual and addictive floral, fruity, and woody fragrance.Fragrance Notes:Top - Sicilian lemon, mandarin, raspberry sorbet, white currant; Middle - Freesia, magnolia, jasmine petals, orange blossom; Base - Sensual woods, white patchouli, musks

title: Modern Muse Eau de Parfum
description: Experience the fragrance that captures your style, your confidence, your creative spirit. An alluring contrast of sparkling florals and sleek, sensual woods.

title: Sensuous Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Warm. Luminous. Feminine.A modern new definition of sensuality. Confident and elegant.A rich core of Molten Woods and Amber, surrounded by atmospheric florals, warmed by a hint of Pepper and a touch of Honey. Estée Lauder Sensuous. Every woman wears it her way.Fragrance Type: Woody AmberFrom the minute it touches a woman's skin, Estée Lauder Sensuous becomes a natural reflection of her. Her grace, confidence and charm. Subtly different on each woman who wears it, the rich, mysterious core of Molten Woods and glowing Amber pulses with a warm, luminous, feminine passion. Enveloping this molten core of precious woods comes the unexpected scent of atmospheric flowers; feminine and airy. A veil of petal-soft textures: sheer Jasmine, Ghost Lily, lush Magnolia and an exclusive Ylang essence. Captivating traces of Black Pepper add mystery to the delicious woodiness and sensuality of creamy Sandalwood. Addictive Honey enhances the warmth, lingering deep within the fragrance while a surprising hint of Mandarin Orange Pulp creates a touch of juiciness to tantalize the senses. Lingering far after she's gone, a celebration of a woman in full possession of her powers.

title: ck one Eau de Toilette
description: CK One Eau de Toilette by Calvin Klein. Purity. Unity. Fresh. The revolutionary first ck fragrance is designed for men and women to share. Clean and contemporary with a refreshing signature throughout, it is intended to be used lavishly.      Top Notes: Pineapple, green notes, mandarin orange, papaya, bergamot, cardamom and lemon     Heart Notes: Nutmeg, violet, orris root, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley and rose     Base Notes: Sandalwood, amber, musk, cedar and oakmoss

title: Black Opium Eau de Toilette
description: Discover a new facet of addiction with the Black Opium Eau de Toilette. Black Opium Eau de Toilette is sensual and luminous, giving addiction a touch of brightness. A fusion of green coffee, green pear and white flowers makes this an addictive and sparkling fragrance. A voluptuous femininity, as addictive as carnal!Fragrance:Top - Green tangerine, pear; Middle - Jasmine tea petal, orange flower petal; Base - Green coffee, white woody

title: Omnia Coral Eau de Toilette
description: Fragrance Notes:Top: goji berries, sparkling citrus allure; Heart: hibiscus flower, fresh floral fruity scent; Base: pomegranate, sweet - tart aroma

title: Living Grace Spray Fragrance
description: Live in grace, and feel grounded in the present moment. Living Grace Spray Fragrance was formulated to help center a woman's mood, enabling her to fully embrace the beauty of living in the present moment each day. This ethereal, clean fragrance evokes a sensory experience that creates uplifting feelings of vibrancy, well-being and clarity. You don't wear it, you live it.  Key Benefits:      Ethereal, clean fragrance     Inspires you to live in the present moment     Feel vibrant, alive and beloved   CLICK HERE for Philosophy Fragrance Finder

title: NARCISO POUDRÉE Eau de Parfum
description: Narciso Rodriguez presents a new addition to his latest feminine fragrance with NARCISO POUDRÉE Eau de Parfum. An irresistible blend of sensual woods, Bulgarian rose and white jasmine surround a heart of musc to create an addictive and elegant fragrance that fascinates. Addictive, powdery, sensual.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bulgarian rose, white jasmine petals; Heart - Musc; Base - Vetiver, black cedar, white cedar

title: Online Only Limited Edition Bamboo Eau de Parfum
description: Gucci Limited Edition Bamboo Eau De Parfum is the original woody floral fragrance, tinted a jewel tone to celebrate the scent's new chapter. Infusing his contemporary vision into every element of the House, creative director Alessandro Michele recasts the Gucci Bamboo fragrance in a modern expression.An updated interpretation on the classic Gucci Bamboo fragrance bottle packaging, the design conveys the scent's grace and femininity and captures the poetry and romance that underscores the House's aesthetic.Fragrance Notes: Soft and intense at once, the scent blooms with notes of exotic Casablanca lily and Tahitian vanilla. Sandalwood and grey amber balance the femininity with a woody contrast, to create a statement of strength and sophistication.

title: Unconditional Love Spray
description: Unconditional Love Spray Fragrance (Eau de Toilette) is a soulful, sweetly warm scent to leave you feeling surrounded by love and happiness. An expressive fragrance infused with black raspberry speaks of soulful love, peaceful white lily makes you feel cherished and cashmere vanilla shares affectionate warmth.  Key Benefits:      A soulful, sweetly warm scent     Feel surrounded by love and happiness     Passionate and enduring   CLICK HERE for Philosophy Fragrance Finder

title: Online Only Rain Eau de Parfum Spray
description: The pure scent of rainfall has been captured with Clean  Rain Eau de Parfum Spray. Hints of daffodil, dewy melon, water lilies, daisies and sheer musk embrace the moment when droplets cling to flower petals and the world feels quiet, soft and bright.Notes:Top Notes: Dewy Melon, Daffodil & Watermint; Mid Notes: Spring Daisy, Water Lily & Violet Leaves; Base Notes: Fluid Musks, Sleek Woods(1.0 oz.)

title: Honey Eau de Parfum
description: Sweet. Sassy. Sunny. Honey Eau de Parfum by Marc Jacobs is a sunny delicious floral - energetic and alluring, with a sparkling, golden touch. The perfect mix of brightness and warmth.     Topnotes - Pear, Juicy Mandarin     Midnotes - Orange Blossom, Peach Nectar, Apricot, Honeysuckle     Basenotes - Honey, Golden Vanilla, Smooth Woods

title: Loveswept Spray Fragrance
description: Loveswept is a lively, romantic fragrance, created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away. This soft floral fragrance sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. Get swept off your feet again and again and feel inspired to live each day with passion.  Key Benefits:      Feel irresistibly swept away     A soft floral scent     Live each day with passion

title: Hot Couture Eau de Toilette
description: An aromatic Eau de Toilette blended with notes of magnolia and ambered vetiver. Like Haute Couture fashion, Hot Couture is a glamorous yet sophisticated fragrance. Through sensuality and warmth Hot Couture creates an elegance that can only be equated with couture runway fashion.Sweet raspberry nectar, magnolia, and ambered vetiver combine to bewitch us with vibrant, confident, and passionate femininity. The Hot Couture young woman is unique, vibrant and fun loving. She is in tune with fashion and trends. She embodies the spontaneous spirit of Givenchy couture - original, provocative and full of charisma.Fragrance Notes:Top - Raspberry nectar; Middles - Magnolia, transparent jasmine; Base - Amber vetiver

title: ck one Summer Eau de Toilette
description: Calvin Klein's ck one Summer Eau de Toilette is hot skin refreshed by a cool breeze. The energy and spirit of a desert ritual paired with the fiery heat of the desert sun.Fragrance Notes:Top - Lime natureprint, citron, cucumber natureprint; Mid - Fiery pepper trio; Base - Creamy musk, guaiac wood, saffron

title: Dahlia Divin Eau de Parfum
description: A golden haute couture fragrance that unveils the divine within you. When Gold meets Fragrance. Like a custom-made Givenchy creation illuminated with a thousand golden threads, Dahlia Divin is an exquisitely refined, sensual fragrance that envelops the skin with a warm radiance and ethereal luster that like a golden haute couture gown, leaves you feeling... divine.Fragrance Notes:Top - Golden mirabelle plum; Part - Pure white jasmine; Base - Sandalwood

title: Angel Shooting Star Refillable Eau de Parfum
description: Be exhilarated with Angel with the Eau de Parfum. The magic of an everlasting star bottle, thanks to Refill Bottles or your perfumer's Source.Click here for store locations

title: Youth Dew Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Absolutely captivating, with opulent flowers, rich spices, precious woods.  In 1953, Estée Lauder introduced Youth-Dew as a scented bath oil that doubled as a perfume--and the world of fragrance was forever changed. Until then, women had relied on the men in their lives to give them perfume as a special gift. But Youth-Dew was created for women to buy for themselves...and they did.  Even today, its captivating, sexy spiciness ensures that this true classic remains a favorite.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Rose, jonquil, lavender     Middle - Jasmine, muguet, spices     Base - Moss, vetiver, patchouli

title: Air di Gioia Eau de Parfum
description: To reconnect with nature and feel joyful again. Air di Gioia is an Eau de Parfum spray that expresses the delicate scent of the Mediterranean breeze. It recreates a breezy walk by the seaside, giving us a fresh, energizing, light scent. The scent starts with emphasis on the elegant white musk chypre base and develops with the airy note of the peony flower. The note is wrapped up in a beautiful floral bouquet of orange blossom and ylang-ylang with soft rosy and green accents for an energizing and delicate aroma.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Mandarin, neroli, pink peppercorn     Middle - Ylang-ylang, orange blossom, peony     Base - Patchouli heart, musk, moss accord

title: Signature Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Vera Wang is a lush floral scent featuring a bouquet of Bulgarian Rose, Calla Lily, Mandarin Flower, Gardenia, Lotus, Iris, White Stephanotis.

title: Bright Crystal Absolu Eau de Parfum
description: Absolute sensuality. Absolute transparency. Absolute brightness. An absolute temptation. Versace Bright Crystal Absolu, the intense version of one of the most beloved jewel-fragrances in the world, where the essence of bright crystal is enhanced to the extreme.The amazing vibrancy of yuzu immediately stands out between Coloured and juicy pomegranate seeds creating an unusual freshness, pure and natural.The heart is enriched with inviting and velvety accents of raspberry, accented by the elegance of peony along with refined notes of magnolia and lotus flowers.Then a trail evokes an intense and voluptuous sensuality, with precious vegetal amber, deep acajou wood, bright and vibrant musk.

title: Miss Dior Eau de Parfum
description: The elegance of a sensual floral chypre elegant and bold, Miss Dior Eau de Parfum captures the timeless Dior chic in a sensual floral chypre. The beauty of Miss Dior stems from the harmonious blend of citrus, floral and woody notes, with chypre base notes. Miss Dior is a promise of love.Fragrance Notes:Top - A citrus burst of calabrian bergamot; Heart - A sensual grasse rose absolute; Base - A vivid Guyana rosewood and pink peppercornsClick Here to discover every facet of Miss Dior

title: Hypnôse Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Hypnôse is an ethereal, cloudlike scent featuring notes of passion flower and violet over a lush mid note of vanilla and jasmine. Hypnôse finishes on sensual base notes of amber, vetiver, and woods.

title: Online Only Skin & Vanilla Eau Fraiche
description: The Clean Skin & Vanilla Eau Fraiche introduces a new heart to live synonymously with the Clean Skin Eau de Parfum. While the fragrance maintains the fresh top note focusing on fruits and florals, the middle adds a sensual sophistication with chocolate and warming coconut. The fragrance focuses on mid of Madagascar vanilla creating a fresh, beachy take on a creamy vanilla fragrance.Fragrance Notes:Top - Hedione, mandarin, red apple; Mid - Chocolate, coconut, Madagascar vanilla; Dry - Ambrox, creamy musk, Haitian vetyver

title: Premiere Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Gucci has long distinguished itself as the label of success for the world’s most stylish individuals. Inspired by the Gucci Premiere Couture collection that debuted at the 2010 Cannes Film Festival, Creative Director Frida Giannini conceived a new fragrance legend in the iconic and sophisticated form of Gucci Premiere. Gucci Premiere is a powerfully sophisticated aroma, with vigorous notes of wood and musk. Just as a leading lady graces the red carpet with her couture Gucci gown, so every woman deserves her Gucci Premiere moment.Top Note: Orange Blossom, Bergamot; Heart Note: Leather, Fur; Base Note: Musk

title: Rain Eau de Toilette
description: Back by popular demand, Rain, a watery floral, is a splash from the past. Lush, and pure, the fragrance opens with the freshness of wet cut grass and pure sparkling notes of wild strawberry and clementine zest. The middle is a lush blend of tropical rain accord, passion flower, and white orchid.  The dry down is composed of beech amber, tree moss, and musks. The subtle blue hue of Marc Jacobs Rain Eau de Toilette spray evokes a cool, refreshing summer shower.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Wet cut grass, sparkling wild strawberry, clementine zest, dewy cypress     Heart - Tropical rain accord, passion flower, sunshine flower, white orchid     Base - Beech amber, tree moss, musk and teakwood

title: Acqua Di Gioia Eau de Toilette
description: Experience Eau De Toilette Gioia, a hymn to nature in all its forms. A clean, incredibly fresh, aquatic scent that is ultra-approachable, yet memorable. This blooming citrus floral scent has notes of primafiore lemon, peonies & water jasmine, and brown sugar.

title: Limited Edition Fiori Eau de Parfum
description: Fiori by Vince Camuto is inspired by the blossoming delphiniums in Vince Camuto's personal garden. Fiori, captures the essence of a very special limited edition summer scent. Staying close to his heritage, Fiori - meaning "Flowers" in Italian - is fresh, light and feminine; authentically uplifting.Top notes of luscious pink grapefruit and ripened white nectarine, compliment the heart of enriched with sheer Iris and dewy freesia, providing a beautiful, purifying backdrop for base notes of rich sandalwood and creamy blonde cedarwood. A soft, contemporary fragrance, Fiori embodies the independent spirit of the Vince Camuto woman.

title: L' Eau d'Issey Pure Eau de Toilette
description: An ode to purity, the simple and beautiful L'Eau d'Issey Pure Eau de Toilette is reminiscent of cool, crystal-clear waters of the ocean and water drops floating gracefully on a radiant bouquet of feminine flowers. A pure, feminine, rich fragrance with orange blossom, amber and woody vibrations.Fragrance Notes:Top - Maritima ambergris; Mid - Lily of the valley, jasmine, rose; Base - Cashmere Wood

title: Calyx
description: An exhilarating scent that is sparkling and fresh. Energizing and audacious, it uplifts the mood and is ideal for the fragrance connoisseur who appreciates the fresh distinction of this unique and highly acclaimed scent.

sub_title: Fuchsia, Black with Dots (online only), Silver (online only), Gold (online only), Black (online only)
title: Refillable Perfume Atomizer
description: Easy to use: Just spray your favorite perfume into the patented silicon mouth to fill the atomizer. Completely washable and re-usable for different fragrances, this design accessory is airline carry-on approved. Made with a glass receptacle for perfume, this strong exterior protects from breakage and will also ensure the perfume will never change composition or irritate skin.Atomizer holds up to 0.17 oz. - 77 sprays.

title: For Her Fleur Musc Eau de Parfum
description: A rare weave of pink florals with hints of rose, peach pulp, soft amber, and wood. Narciso Rodriguez For Her Fleur Musc Eau de Parfum Spray is a glamorous, sensual, intoxicating fragrance that embodies true elegance and timeless luxury.Fragrance Notes: A surge of spicy floral notes. A generous bouquet of roses enhanced by the unexpected vibrations of pink peppercorns. Luminous blond woody notes where patchouli blends with the softness of amber. Resonating around heart of musc. Sensual and addictive.

title: Online Only Red Door Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Open to the deep, richly sensual scent of Red Door Eau de Toilette Spray. Exotic ylang-ylang and red roses are blended with rare, oriental orchid, jasmine, forest lilies, and Moroccan orange flower.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Lily of the Valley, freesia, wild violets     Middle - Red rose, Moroccan orange flower, jasmine, ylang; Base - Oakmoss, sandalwood, honey

title: Bamboo Eau de Toilette
description: Gucci Bamboo narrative continues with Gucci Bamboo Eau de Toilette. Lighter than the original essence, Gucci Bamboo Eau de Toilette offers alluring insight into the Gucci woman's sensual, romantic side. Rich Tahitian vanilla and Casablanca lily paired with bright mandarin notes.Fragrance Notes:Top - Sicilian bergamot, orange blossom, pear, mandarin essence; Heart - Casablanca lily, ylang ylang extra - comoros, sambac jasmine petals; Base - Ambergris, sandalwood, Tahitian vanilla, white musky notes

title: Sugared Amber Dreams Spray
description: Sugared Amber Dreams a new fragrance, by Pacifica. May your dreams be filled with sparkling sugar, heady vanilla and warm amber. An intoxicating aura of rainbow wishes, magic and love for the bravest hearts.

title: Daisy Dream Eau de Parfum
description: Daisy Dream Eau de Parfum by Marc Jacobs is an elegant interpretation of the original Eau de Toilette. Frosted, Daisy Dream Forever features blue daisy icons on the cap and shawl that provide a colorful and textural detail that is refined and airy in feel, yet eye-catching.Get lost in a dream with this irresistible Eau de Parfum. Inspired by ethereal blue skies, Daisy Dream Forever embodies the youthful reverie and charm of Marc's Dream girl. An elegant addition to the Daisy Dream fragrance family. Daisy Dream Forever is a deeper interpretation of the signature's key notes of blackberry, blue wisteria and white woods which leave a lasting impression of luxurious floralcy, airy succulence and a velvety dream of a drydown.Elegantly crafted, the bottle is dressed in a fresh, new color palette. Deep blue translucent glass reveals the endlessly ethereal fragrance as lace-like frosted blue daisy details rest on the bottle's curved shoulders. Complementary blue daisy petals adorn the shiny silver cap adding a touch of sophistication. Satin and glossy textures lace the outer carton in a dreamy blue hue with accents of metallic silver, reflecting Marc's mix of intricate detailing.Fragrance Notes:Top - Blackberry, grapefruit, pear; Mid - Jasmine, lychee, blue wisteria; Base - White woods, musks, coconut water

title: Original Clean Eau de Parfum Spray
description:
The original CLEAN fragrance that started it all. Inspired by soap, this scent is perfect for women who don¿t want to smell like a particular note or fragrance but enjoy crisp, subtle scents. The fragrance opens with a bright burst of freshness and dries down to a simply CLEAN scent.
 
Top Notes: Orange, Lime & Pink Grapefruit
Mid Notes: Passion Lily, Rose & Geranium
Base Notes: Spring Fresh Floral & White Musk

title: Brit Rhythm Women Floral Eau De Toilette Spray
description: Brit Rhythm Women Floral Eau De Toilette Spray by Burberry is a sensual, floral fragrance with an unexpected fruity twist. Fresh top notes of orchard fruit, Sicilian lemon and orange open up to an intoxicating heart of Egyptian jasmine, lotus blossom and dewy lilac. Base notes of ambery woods, driftwood and musk give a sultry dry down.Fragrance Notes:Top: orchard fruity, Sicilian lemon, orange; Heart: Egyptian jasmine, lotus blossome, dewy lilac; Base: ambery woods, driftwood, musk

title: White Linen Eau de Parfum Spray
description: With the crispness of clean sheets on a summer day, and the coolness of white flowers and fresh greenery. Bulgarian Rose, Violet and Orris blossoms lend a kind of natural elegance that transcends the seasons.

title: L' Eau d'Issey Pure Eau de Parfum
description: An ode to purity, the simple and beautiful L' Eau d'Issey Pure Eau de Parfum by Issey Miyake is reminiscent of cool, crystal-clear waters of the ocean and water drops floating gracefully on a radiant bouquet of feminine flowers. A pure, feminine, rich fragrance with orange blossom, amber and woody vibrations.Fragrance Notes:Top - Captive maritima, Lily of the Valley, orange blossom; Middle - Turkish rose, jasmine; Bottom - Ambergris, cashmeran

title: Online Only Green Tea Scent Spray Eau de Parfum
description: From a lush, green world of freshness comes Elizabeth Arden Green Tea, the fragrance that energizes the body, excites the senses and invigorates the spirit. Brimming with sparkling flavors, the scent harmoniously intertwines natural ingredients to form an uplifting, revitalizing and balanced fragrance experience.

title: Sensuous Nude Eau de Parfum Spray
description: A new dimension in sensuality. Confident. Natural. Radiantly alive. Wrap your senses in the warmth of sultry Woods and Musks, delicate Muguet, Sicilian Bergamot and Baie Rose. Estée Lauder Sensuous Nude. The seductive new fragrance.

title: Knowing Eau de Parfum
description: Introduced in 1988, Knowing is a deep, woody fragrance with a European sensibility. Heady and exciting, it has great style without even trying. The elegant bottle, which looks sculpted from a solid crystal, is an excellent example of how an Estée Lauder fragrance pleases your every sense, and brings the luxurious distinction of Knowing into the palm of your hand.

title: Dior Addict Eau Fraiche Eau de Toilette
description: A radiant and sparkling fresh floral. The Dior Addict Eau Fraîche Eau de Toilette composition opens with the sparkling citrus notes of sweet-and-sour grapefruit heightened with the smoothness of calabrian bergamot. Its diverse heart, at once tangy and floral, reveals a subtle bouquet of freesia and lily-of-the-valley. A joyful signature that concludes with woody notes blended with enveloping white musks. The sparkle of a tangy fresh floral. Dior Addict is an instant, immediate statement. It is full without being opulent and charming without being too demonstrative.

title: OH, LOLA! Eau de Parfum Spray
description: OH, LOLA! Marc Jacobs is flirtatious and charming with a sparkling personality. It leaves you feeling light-hearted and youthful, flirting with your senses!

title: Classique Eau de Toilette
description: The constant theme that runs through each of Jean Paul Gaultier's creations and spectacular fashion shows is the 'Gaultier' image of woman. Jean Paul Gaultier pays homage to woman with his unique floral oriental scent, which comes in a sensuously curved bottle, a woman's body in a corset.

title: Online Only Beyond Paradise Eau de Parfum
description: A fragrance fantasy...an intoxication of the senses. Estée Lauder Beyond Paradise Eau de Parfum transports you to a perfect world of optimism and wonder. Unfolds on your skin with a fascinating blend of tropical wetness, zesty freshness and bursting floralcy. Blue hyacinth and orange flower templar blend with laelia orchid and crepe jasmin, warmed with zebrano wood.Fragrance Notes:Top - Eden's mist, blue hyacinth, orange flower templar, jabuticaba fruit; Middle - Laelia orchid, crepe jasmin, mahonia japonica, pink honeysuckle; Base - Natal plum blossoms, ambrette seed, zebrano wood, golden melaleuca bark

title: Online Only Spellbound Eau de Parfum
description: Rich spices and rare blossoms take on an absolute magnetism with hints of fruit and the sensual luxury of vanilla.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Rose, muguet, apricot     Middle - Orange blossom, carnation, cardamom     Base - Sandalwood, vanilla, amber

title: Turquoise Eau de Parfum
description: Michael Kors Turquoise Eau de Parfum, a floral fragrance with the natural freshness of cucumber and lime juxtaposed with the hypnotic charms of wild orchid and jasmine. Its modern sensuality is emboldened by a fleur de sel accord, and the lush warmth of ambrox, musk and cedar wood.Fragrance Notes:Top - Water Lily buds open to reveal a dewy floralcy kissed by the natural freshness of cucumber and lime; Mid - At the heart is a dreamy intimacy imparted by florals of jasmine and wild orchid for smooth opulence; Base - Casual luxury builds from the drydown in the jewel-toned softness of ambrox and musk, and textural warmth of cedar wood

title: Sexy Blossom Eau de Parfum
description: A fragrance born of the essence of spring-enchanting, flirtatious and romantic-Michael Kors Sexy Blossom Eau de Parfum is a floral woody musk scent with a sensual heart of beguiling blooms.Fragrance Notes:Top - Lychee, rose petals, dewey green leaves; Mid - Pink peony, pink orchid accord, muguet, freesia; Base: Ambrox, musk, sandalwood

title: Dolce Floral Drops Eau de Toilette
description: Dolce Floral Drops Eau de Toilette by Dolce&Gabbana has the rare beauty of a fresh, floral scent. The Eau de Toilette is inspired by the notes of Dolce Eau de Parfum, preserving its harmonious signature of white flowers, with a heart of white amaryllis. Dolce Floral Drops combines these ingredients with the lively and crisp green opening of neroli leaves, that enriches its character and define its freshness right from the opening of the fragrance.

title: Obsessed for Women Eau de Parfum
description: Iconic. Contemporary. Authentic. A female interpretation of an Oriental lavender. A masculine Fougère structure is contrasted with feminine warmth; the fragrance is formed around a base of white lavender, while creamy musks envelope and sensually soften. The tension of the aromatic top notes with the smooth creaminess of the back, further explores the tension between the masculine and the feminine.Obsessed for Women Eau de Parfum forges a new fragrance category beyond rules with a bold aromatic heart of white lavender wrapped in captive musks. The overdose of lavender, a typical masculine ingredient, creates an aromatic oriental that is innovative, anti-trend, and against current market perceptions. The adrenaline of lavender freshness builds your heart rate revealing a deep fixation that lives within you.Fragrance Notes:Top - Violet leaf absolute; Heart - White lavender; Base - Musks

title: Guilty Black Eau de Toilette
description: Gucci Guilty Black: indulge in your burning desires. The scent of burning desires. Life is thrilling and meant to be lived to the fullest.Top Notes: Pink Pepper, Red Fruits; Middle Note: Violet; Bottom Notes: Patchouli, Amber

title: Classique Eau de Parfum
description: Sensual and sophisticated, Jean Paul Gaultier's Eau de Parfum is an interpretation of his famous woman's fragrance. Warm and profound, its charm lies in its floral, voluptuous, and deliciously entrancing notes.The Eau de Parfum is a floral bouquet, a more intense olfactory concentration than that of the Eau de Toilette.Fragrance Notes:Top - Ginger; Heart - Orange blossom; Base - Vanilla

title: La vie est Belle Legere L'Eau de Parfum
description: L'Eau de Parfum Legere creates a lighter, silkier trail while remaining equally chic and delightful as the classic Eau de Parfum. This fragrance represents a new olfactory category, between an Eau de Parfum and an Eau De Toilette.      Top Note: The elegance of Iris becomes the backbone of the fragrance. It blossoms from the first to the last note like never before.     Middle Note: The strength of Patchouli gives strength and depth.     Base Note: A sweet gourmand adds a burst of unexpected radiance with a touch of Musk.

title: Online Only Cinnabar Eau de Parfum
description: Cinnabar is warm, mysterious an endlessly appealing spicy scent. Jasmine, orange flower, clove and patchouli blend intriguingly into an intense, sensual experience.Fragrance Notes:Top - Jasmine, orange flower, tangerine; Middle - Clove, muguet, lily; Base - Olibanum, sandalwood, patchouli

title: Organza Eau de Parfum
description: Introduced in 1997. Organza Eau de Parfum is a classic blend of sensuality, refinement and opulence, Organza's floral notes infused with amber and vanilla are the epitome of timeless beauty. It resonates like the goddess that exists in every woman. Pure. Classic. Elegant. Oriental floral.Fragrance Notes:Top - Honeysuckle, gardenia; Middle - Peony, jasmine; Base - Cedar, nutmeg, vanilla

title: Illicit Flower Eau de Toilette
description: A strong yet poetic name provocative with an underlying softness echoing to a floral fragrance referring to a graceful woman. The Illicit woman is trendy, happy, young, fun and deliberately graceful. Illicit Flower Eau de Toilette spray is a floral musky scent.Fragrance Notes:Top - Apricot, mandarin; Heart - Rose, grapefruit flower; Base - Musk, sandalwood

title: Princess Revolution Eau de Toilette
description: Princess Revolution Eau de Toilette spray by Vera Wang is for the confident, edgy and rebellious. She's found the perfect balance of rock and romance. She likes punk music and she's a bit avant-garde. Her only rule is to never follow any rules.Fragrance Notes:Top - Black cherry, blood orange and watermelon sorbet; Mid - Lily of the valley, red apple blossom, and jasmine; Base - Atlas cedarwood and amberwood

title: Flora Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Flora by Gucci is the utterly feminine, deeply sensual fragrance for women, inspired by Gucci's iconic Flora Pattern. The fragrance is characterised by contrasts and is for the classic, modern Gucci woman who has a youthful, feminine spirit.Top Note: Citrus fruit, Peony; Heart Note: Roses, rare Osmanthus flower; Base Note: Patchouli, Sandalwood

title: Amore Eau de Parfum
description: Amore Eau de Parfum by Vince Camuto is the love you will never forget. With radiant, fresh and floral notes.

title: Brit For Her Eau de Toilette
description: Burberry Brit is a smooth fragrance that begins with notes of pear, lime and lemongrass followed by mid notes of almond and peony. The scent closes on lush notes of vanilla, amber, and tonka bean.Fragrance Notes:Top: pear, lime, lemongrass; Heart: almond, peony; Base: vanilla, amber, tonka bean

title: Shalimar Eau de Toilette
description: Inspired by the passionate love story between an emperor and an Indian princess, Shalimar, which means "temple of love" in Sanskrit, symbolizes the promise of eternal love forevermore. It is a fragrance of desire. With its smoldering and slightly impertinent character, the star oriental fragrance in perfumery embodies skin-caressing sensuality with a hint of the forbidden. "Wearing Shalimar means letting your senses take over" - Jacques Guerlain.Oriental. Voluptuous, sensual, spellbinding. A flight of flowers and bergamot whips up the top notes with a breeze of freshness. The heart is warmed by enveloping and delicately powdery notes of iris, jasmine and rose. To conclude, the presence of vanilla, rounded balmy notes and the gourmand warmth of Tonka bean orchestrate a sensual symphony for the dry-down.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot; Heart - Iris, jasmine, rose; Dry Down - Vanilla, Tonka bean

title: Divine Decadence Eau de Parfum
description: Sparkling expression of glamour and luxury, Divine Decadence Eau de Parfum spray gives indulgence a touch of brightness. A sparkling champagne doused interpretation of the original... Just  as decadent but expressed in a more effervescent, floral way. A subtle twist of Decadence signature to make Divine Decadence your new daily companion! Decadence is a lifestyle, a way of living, transcending age and style. Addictive, can't get enough... a girl chooses to be decadent, she is not just decadent.Fragrance Notes:Top - Champagne extract, orange blossom, creamy bergamot; Mid - Gardenia, hydrangea and honeysuckle; Base - Saffron, vanilla, liquid amber

title: Online Only Tuscany Per Donna Eau de Parfum
description: As sensuous and luminous as the Italian countryside. Tuscany Per Donna Eau de Parfum by Estée Lauder is a fragrance that perfectly captures the warm light and relaxed sensuality of a romantic hillside villa. Even the name Tuscany Per Donna, which means "Tuscany for Women," reflects the lush blend of blooming flowers and Mediterranean herbs, softened with rich sandalwood and sweet vanilla.  Fragrance Notes:      Top Notes - Rose, muguet, citrus, mediterranean herbs     Middle Notes - Jasmine, carnation, honeysuckle, peony     Base Notes - Sandalwood, amber, vanilla

catalogs: Fragrance, Women's Fragrance, Body Mist & Hair Mist
title: ck one Body Spray
description: The lighter version of your favorite scent, ck one Body Spray by Calvin Klein is the perfect way to refresh and re-energize yourself throughout the day.

title: Sì Eau de Toilette
description: Giorgio Armani's Sì Eau de Toilette is a delicate and light interpretation of Sì for the modern woman. Key notes are pear, freesia, and ambery wood for a bright, graceful, and refined scent.

title: Ysatis Eau de Toilette
description: Ysatis is a perfume of power and fatal seduction. A fragrance brimming with radiance, luxury and sensuality. Givenchy's Oriental delight. Known as the "thousand-faceted fragrance" Ysatis is assertive and seductive and the Ysatis woman is as multi-facetted as her fragrance.Combining Eastern richness and Western spirit, Ysatis citrus top notes mingle with lush blossoms like ylang ylang, jasmine, rose, and tuberose; deepened with amber, patchouli and vanilla.Fragrance Notes:Top - Mandarine, fleur d'oranger; Middle - Ylang ylang, jasmine, rose, tubereuse; Base - Amber, patchouli, vanilla

title: Online Only Fresh Laundry & Lavender Eau Fraiche
description: A modern, lavendaceous twist on the classic Clean Fresh Laundry Fragrance. Opening with a juicy-sweet pineapple and fruity top-note, lending a nectarous character to the floral heart of night blooming jasmine, star anise, orchid, fresh cut grasses and lavender, and finishing with notes of precious woods, amber, patchouli, Tonka bean and musk.Fragrance Notes:Top - Pineapple, fruity; Mid - Night blooming jasmine, star anise, orchid, fresh cut grasses, lavender; Dry - Precious woods, amber, patchouli, Tonka bean, musk

title: Eau Parfumée au thé vert Eau de Cologne
description:
Bvlgari invites you to experience sensations of pure and immediate luxury in a unique ritual of hospitality. Eau Parfumée au thé vert Eau de Cologne born from the rich culture of tea, a vital expression of refined elegance, it awakens and refreshes the senses.

Top Notes: Italian Bergamot
Heart Notes: Green Tea
Base Notes: Pepper

title: Eau Parfumée Au Thé Rouge
description: Redolent of solar South African Red Tea, Eau Parfumée Au Thé Rouge by Bvlgari is a vibrant luxury Eau de Cologne for men and women. A solar fragrance with a flamboyant olfactive universe that creates an experience of absolute indulgence, conveying the warmth and fullness of sensual pleasure. Olfactory family: woody - LuminousFragrance Notes:Top: pink pepper, orange; Heart: red tea accord, fig pulp; Base: walnut, musk

title: Online Only  Rain & Pear Eau Fraiche
description: Clean Rain & Pear Eau Fraiche evokes many olfactive emotions. In the Eau de Parfum, Clean focused on rains impact on dewy fresh florals. In the Eau Fraiche they explore the way melon and coconut can interact to bring out a sun kissed exotic rain. In an effort to take that freshness further, pear is added to the top for a sparkling and juicy impact.Fragrance Notes:Top - Cassis, freesia, guava, pear; Mid - Chocolate, melon, coconut; Dry - Creamy musk, violet leaves, vetyver

title: Fresh Laundry Eau de Parfum Spray
description:
Imagine freshly laundered sheets drying under open blue skies. CLEAN Fresh Laundry captures the crisp yet delicate scent of freshly laundered linens. With just a few sprays, this irresistible scent will embrace and comfort you just like your favorite linens.
Top Notes: Brazilian Orange, Mexican Lime & Fresh Mown Grass
Mid Notes: Rose Otto & Night Blooming Jasmine
Base Notes: Heliotrope & Woody Musk

title: Loveswept Eau de Parfum
description: Fall even more deeply for this lively and romantic fragrance. Loveswept Eau de Parfum is formulated with a richer, more refined blend of oils to provide a finer, stronger, longer-lasting scent. Created to make a woman feel irresistibly swept away, Loveswept's soft floral composition sparkles with energy and leaves you with a soft embrace of happiness and love. Get swept off your feet again and again by Loveswept Eau de Parfum and be inspired to live each day with passion.

title: Pour Femme Eau de Parfum
description: Pour Femme embodies the essence of the Dolce & Gabbana woman: passionate, sensual and seductive, confident and aware of her own beauty. The fragrance epitomizes Mediterranean harmonies and contrasts. Nuances of Raspberry give way to the addictive qualities of the sugary 'Guimauve' and full-bodied sensuality of the Vanilla base notes.Top notes: Neroli, RaspberryHeart notes: Jasmine, Orange BlossomBase notes: Marshmallow Accord, Heliotrope, Vanilla

title: Eternity NOW Eau de Parfum
description: Eternity NOW Eau de Parfum by Calvin Klein is eluminous, lush and sensuous. An instant burst of brightness from a juicy lychee sparkles in the top. The heart opens with a floral bouquet of lush peonies, radiant peach blossoms and sensuous neroli petals. Wrapped by a soft cashmere veil, sensual ambrox and precious musk for a warm, intimate aura. Bright addictive floral.  Fragrance Notes:      Top: Lychee, quince sorbet, nectarine     Heart: Peonies, peach blossoms, neroli petals     Base: Cashmere veil, ambrox, precious musk

title: Live Irrésistible Eau de Parfum Délicieuse
description: Live Irrésistible Eau de Parfum Délicieuse is the perfume of a woman who makes her life a playground. Givenchy brings this spirit to life with a new creation, a floral delicacy as sassy as it is sweet. A truly delicious fragrance.The delight of living intensely, without any rules or constraints. Seize each moment and bend the rules. Live Irrésistible is the perfume of a woman who breaks free from conventions and makes her life a playground. An addictive accord born from the merging of a madeleine and a caramel-coated rose, highlighted by a touch of sensual Tonka bean. A truly delicious fragrance in this bottle patterned with the iconic stud. The delight of living intensely, without any rules or constraints.#LifeisaPlaygroundFragrance Notes:Top - Madeleine Accord; Mid - Rose, orange blossom; Base - Tonka bean

title: Online Only Estée Super Eau de Parfum
description: The signature scent, classically feminine yet intriguing. Notes of jasmine, rose and ylang-ylang create a fragrance that is feminine, warm and sweetly floral. Its brilliant top note plays against a rich, sensuous background. The pure fragrance spray includes a rich concentration of the Estée scent, between Parfum and Eau de Parfum.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Jasmine, rose, muguet     Middle - Coriander, ylang-ylang, orris     Base - Sandalwood, moss

title: NARCISO Eau de Parfum
description: A new moment of grace, Narciso Rodriguez NARCISO Eau de Parfum captures a femininity that fascinates and reveals the seductive power of women. With NARCISO, "women will make men turn their heads." A beautiful woody musky floral creating an addictive attraction.Fragrance Notes:Top - Rose Floral, Bulgarian Rose / White Floral Gardenia; Heart - Musc Narciso; Drydown - Woody, Vetiver and Cedars

title: Sì Intense Eau de Parfum
description: For the modern woman who says yes to her most vibrant emotions: seduction, love, and passion. Sì Intense highlights the warmth and elegance of the modern woman.Fragrance Notes:Top - Blackcurrant nectar; Middle - Silky white freesia; Base - Vanilla chypre accord

title: Pour Femme Intense Eau de Parfum
description: Intense is a harmony of olfactive contrasts that are refined yet powerfully addictive. The heightened potency of this oriental floral ignites the senses, as unashamedly provocative notes of vaporous white flowers evoke long-forgotten memories and incite deep passion.Fragrance Notes:Top notes: Neroli, Raspberry; Heart notes: Orange Blossom, Tuberose; Base notes: Sandalwood

title: Cucumber Eau de Toilette
description: Marc Jacobs Cucumber offers a delectable summer treat with the crisp cool scent of cucumber. Clean and refreshing, Cucumber has a delicious lightness that is soothing and breezy. The scent is crisp, green and fresh. The fragrance opens with top notes of watery cucumber, fragrant lotus leaf and crisp bamboo, enhanced with a floral heart of Lily of the Valley, linden blossom, and Dutch freesia. The dry down of frosted musk and blonde woods lingers with a soft, sensuous air. The cool green tint of Marc Jacobs Cucumber spray reflects the inviting garden freshness of Summer, evoking crisp cucumber kissed by morning dew, filling the air with refreshing scent.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Watery cucumber, lotus leaf, crisp bamboo     Heart - Lily of the Valley, linden blossom, and Dutch freesia     Base: Frosted musk and blonde woods

title: Joyful Eau de Parfum
description: Joy is a state of mind, where everything seems possible and nothing is too daunting. This feeling is perfectly captured with the Escada Joyful Eau de Parfum. The Escada Joyful woman approaches life with positivity, spontaneity and charm, taking the advantage of every opportunity and experiencing each day full of joy and confidence.  Designed to evoke the feel of skyscrapers in the city, the flacon plays homage to city life and the opportunities of joy. The flacon shimmers with confidence, allure and the promise of joy. A peony-pink jeweled top crowns the flacon, wrapped in a luxurious way with a touch of gold.  The scent bursts into life with the bright fresh blackcurrant sorbet. The essence of charm is given by spicy floral and dewy notes released by the jubilant pink peony. A drop of honeycomb adds comfort and warm.

title: Play for Her Eau de Parfum
description: Embrace your playful side with this deliciously floral Eau de Parfum. It's a delightfully stylish scent for women who know how to turn on the charm and play with their sensuality.Fragrance Notes:Top - White peach; Heart - Amyris wood; Base - Tiare flower

title: Pear Eau de Toilette
description: Marc Jacobs Pear Eau de Toilette spray captures the sweet nectar of summer. Deliciously fresh and ripe, it tempts the senses with its savory aroma. Uniquely delectable, Pear is a delicious summer indulgence to enjoy. Developed by honorine blanc of firmenich, the fruity woody fragrance opens with the tantalizing aroma of fresh, ripe pear invigorated with bergamot and lemon peel. The heart of juniper, gin accord and freesia imparts a sweet richness. Musk, teakwood and a soft amber round out the balance of notes with smooth softness and warm sensuality. The warm golden tint conveys the juiciness of a perfectly ripe pear.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Pear, bergamont, lemon peel     Heart - Gin accord, juniper, freesia     Base - Teakwood, musk, soft amber

title: L'eau D'Issey Florale Eau de Toilette
description: L'Eau d'Issey Florale is the pure expression of a flower. Its top notes smell of the breath of a barely opened rose. This flower's true nature, its dewy softness, is set against the sparkling and crystalline notes of mandarin. In the heart notes, the floral purity of lily, with accents of orange flowers, is soft like a caress. The deep scent of white wood travels along a trail of musk, giving its base the weight of a fragrance from the past.

title: Flora Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Flora by Gucci is the utterly feminine, deeply sensual fragrance for women, inspired by Gucci's iconic Flora Pattern. The fragrance is characterised by contrasts and is for the classic, modern Gucci woman who has a youthful, feminine spirit.Top Note: Citrus fruit, Peony; Heart Note: Roses, rare Osmanthus flower; Base Note: Patchouli, Sandalwood

title: Opium Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Intriguing and completely alluring, Opium weaves its fragrant spell with notes of aromatic cloves, myrrh, patchouli, and cinnamon blended with the deep, almost musky sweetness of plum merged with peach. Give in to the power of this well-loved fragrance.

title: Shalimar Eau de Parfum
description: Inspired by the passionate love story between an emperor and an Indian princess, Shalimar, which means "temple of love" in Sanskrit, symbolizes the promise of eternal love forevermore. It is a fragrance of desire. With its smoldering and slightly impertinent character, the star oriental fragrance in perfumery embodies skin-caressing sensuality with a hint of the forbidden. "Wearing Shalimar means letting your senses take over" - Jacques Guerlain.Oriental. Voluptuous, sensual, spellbinding. A flight of flowers and bergamot whips up the top notes with a breeze of freshness. The heart is warmed by enveloping and delicately powdery notes of iris, jasmine and rose. To conclude, the presence of vanilla, rounded balmy notes and the gourmand warmth of Tonka bean orchestrate a sensual symphony for the dry-down.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot; Heart - Iris, jasmine, rose; Dry Down - Vanilla, Tonka bean

title: Walk On Air Sunshine Eau de Parfum
description: A lighter weight, extra-refreshing edition of Walk On Air by Kate Spade New York! Made to surprise and delight you, Walk On Air Sunshine brings to life the effervescent, colorful essence of Kate Spade New York.Fragrance Notes: Energetic notes of juicy clementine, sparkling linden blossom and uplifting Sicilian bergamot craft a vibrant, youthful opening that embodies the pure shimmering sensation of the spring sun's scattered rays. At its heart, soft green violet leaf, cyclamen and intoxicating jasmine sambac blend masterfully for a weightless, carefree spirit that dances on your skin like sunshine through crisp green tree tops. Background notes of lentisque, vetiver and sensual white peach create fun, sophisticated contrasting facets for irresistible texture and lasting joy.

title: The One Eau de Toilette
description: Dolce&Gabbana The One Eau de Toilette is for the woman who is radiant, lively, spontaneous and full of life.Inspired by the spirit of Naples, she is joyful, exuberant, and inspiring. Enchanting, feminine and sensual The One Eau de Toilette highlights the iconic floral fragrance with an added dose of freshness to brighten and heighten the Madonna Lily.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot, mandarin, lychee, peach; Heart - Madonna lily, lily of the valley, jasmine; Base - Vanilla, amber, musk, plum, vetiver

title: Omnia Indian Garnet Eau de Toilette
description: A passion for colored gemstones inspires Bvlgari to create magnificent jewels distinguished by splendid color harmonies. That same passion prompts the magnificent Italian jeweler to express the essence of these gems in precious fragrances.Like a jewel, a perfume is talismanic: It possesses the evocative power to summon up memories, impressions, emotion...Today, Bvlgari presents Omnia Indian Garnet.Intoxicating. Mysterious. Desirable. Feminine.The Mandarin Garnet is not only precious: It is rare. Bewitched by its fiery orange radiance, the jeweler interprets this gemstone in a fragrance: Omnia Indian Garnet, a tribute to shimmering colors and sensual flowers.For Bvlgari, Master Perfumer Alberto Morillas imagined a composition of rich florals. At its heart, he placed night - blooming Indian Tuberose for its seductive femininity, completed by the delicate, fruity nuances of Osmanthus flowers.Created for an ultra - feminine woman, a woman sure of her charms: Desirable, seductive yet somehow mysterious and elusive.Fragrance Notes:Top: mandarin, saffron: a vibrant and refined energy; Heart: Indian tuberose and osmanthus: eternal and carnal feminine flowers; Base: Indian woods and amber: a delicate and silky sensuality.

title: Online Only Omnia Amethyste Eau de Toilette Spray
description: Bvlgari Omnia Amethyste is an elegant and delightful floral fragrance inspired by the captivating aura of the amethyst gemstone; throughout history one of the favorite gemstones most admired by Aristocratic women. A young, modern, floral Eau De Toilette of graceful femininity.Fragrance Notes:Top: green sap, grapefruit; Heart: iris flower, Bulgarian rosebud; Base: heliotrope, solar wood

title: Samsara Eau de Parfum
description: Jean-Paul Guerlain created Samsara for the woman of his life. His only indications were sandalwood and jasmine, which the "Lady of Samsara" particularly liked. Jean-Paul Guerlain travelled to India many times to acquire the purest sandalwood and a jasmine used only for religious offerings until then. Samsara is a sensual version of seduction for a woman who has found harmony and balance, which is notably conveyed through the composition's raw materials.Woody Oriental. Harmonious, spellbinding, embracing. As Samsara takes flight, it enwraps us in jasmine flower, which dominates the scent, before sunny ylang-ylang flower embellishes it, the better to unite it with the radiant and generous warmth of sandalwood. Lastly, iris, Tonka bean and vanilla harmonize and render sublime this blend with its remarkable trail.Fragrance Notes:Top - Jasmine; Heart - Ylang Ylang, sandalwood; Dry Down - Iris, Tonka bean, vanilla

title: Angel Gravity Star
description: Defying the laws of gravity, a new star is born in the Angel universe. This majestic sculpture was designed as an infinite star revolving around its core. In perpetual motion, this new gem pierces the celestial skyline exposing its countless facets. A work of art carved out of starlight, this precious star was created to be treasured and refilled forever.   Celestial Facet: A wisp of fresh air. It is both ethereal and transparent-a heavenly evocation. Delicious Facet: Delightful aromas evoke the innocent pleasures of childhood and images of decadent treats. Voluptuous Facet: Captivating oriental notes unleash the mystery and sensual essence of a woman. Click here for store locations

title: Ralph Fresh Eau de Toilette
description: Ralph Fresh is a refreshing and free-spirited women's scent, inspired by a cool, sparkling lemon sorbet. With blooming magnolia, sparkling lemon and chilled watermelon ingredients, Ralph Fresh captures Ralph Lauren's love of playfulness and zest for life.

title: Flora by Gucci Eau Fraiche Eau De Toilette Spray
description: Flora by Gucci Eau Fraîche, a fragrance as gently beguiling as the scent of spring blooms. Where the Eau de Toilette befits the day, the Eau de Parfum the night, so Flora by Gucci Eau Fraîche is for any moment when our mademoiselle seeks to grace herself with a fragrance that is an airy, sparkling, ethereal light.Top Note: Citrus fruit, Peony; Heart Note: Roses, rare Osmanthus flower; Base Note: Patchouli, Sandalwood

title: Clean Cool Cotton Eau de Parfum
description: Clean Cool Cotton Eau de Parfum captures the optimistic feeling of a sunny day. This carefree quality is wrapped with authentic touches of nature that recall crisp blue skies, sunshine glows and the soothing texture of clean cotton.Top Notes: Italian bergamot, Crisp green apple, lemon zest; Mid Notes: Mimosa blossom, cooling mint, fresh cotton Accord; Base Notes: Creamy musks, peach skin, amber droplet

title: Dahlia Divin Le Nectar de Parfum
description: A fragrance that is as luxurious as gold with all the delicateness of gold leaf, this Allure award winning fragrance consumes you in a sunny and addictive trail of scent. With smooth silkiness and the delicacy of satin, Dahlia Divin Le Nectar de Parfum unfolds into an enveloping caress of rare sensuality and grace. It is a solar fragrance with sparkling notes that linger in its wake.An apparition so luminous, so fascinating and charismatic that her presence feels like radiant sunshine - her absence, an eclipse. She's a goddess of our time - an icon. She is the woman with the dazzling aura, celebrated by Dahlia Divin le Nectar de Parfum.Fragrance Notes:Top - Mimosa; Middle - Jasmine sambac & rose; Bottom - Tonka bean & sandalwood

title: J'adore L'Or
description: The voluptuousness and harmony of floral and oriental notes. J'adore L'Or by Dior is an ode to noble materials, a sensual fragrance with balance that stems from a harmonious blend of several floral absolutes: may rose absolute and grasse jasmine absolute. These Absolutes comes from the flowers harvested at the Domaine de Manon, which are exclusively reserved for Dior. The unique climatic conditions in this exceptional region, located between the sea and the mountains, give the flowers their fully original character.Delicately blended together with rare ingredients, the Indian tuberose and Tahitian vanilla absolutes unleash their highly seductive oriental notes, enveloping the floral notes in a voluptuous caress. Highly concentrated and as subtle as it is opulent, J'adore L'Or is a genuine olfactory challenge: the encounter between grasse and the orient.The simplicity often hides an extreme sophistication. J'adore is a perfect harmony between former and modern perfumery: the most beautiful essences and natural flower absolutes in a modern writing. No matter how magical it is, J'adore is above all an art of raw material.

title: Beautiful Eau de Toilette Spray
description: A blend of rose, lily, tuberose and orange flower.  Brightened with citrus, warmed by woods and spices.

title: Online Only Pop Electric G Eau de Parfum
description: Harajuku Lovers Pop Electric G Eau de Parfum is a fragrance created by pop singer and fashion icon, Gwen Stefani. G is silver. She has rockstar vibes and an undeniable mysterious energy. Wear day or night. Pop Art inspired bottle looks great on your dresser or vanity. A modern oriental gourmand.Fragrance Notes:Top - Crisp mandarin, fresh coconut, apple skin; Mid - Jasmine sambac, soft freesia, magnolia vapor; Base - Coconut cream, white sandalwood and cotton woods

title: Online Only Green Tea Mimosa Eau de Toilette
description: Graceful. Animated. Bubbly. This citrus sparkling floral fragrance instantly transports you to a garden of surprise and delight where quiet stillness is contrasted by graceful yet animated mimosa pom poms. Breathe in the top notes of green tea vapors intermingling with citruses and let its bubbly heart of Moroccan mimosa absolute wrap you in the days of innocence. Like the sunshine pouring down from the sky, be dazzled by its base -- a soft finale of heliotrope and ambrette seed. An invitation to watch mimosas dance summer away.Fragrance Notes:Top - Green tea vapors, citruses; Heart - Moroccan mimosa absolute; Base - Heliotrope, ambrette seed

title: Pleasures Intense Eau de Parfum Spray
description: New flowers. New pleasures. Estée Lauder pleasures intense is a deeper, richer sister to classic Estée Lauder pleasures. Retaining the radiant clarity of the original, this exciting scent is a wonderfully feminine celebration of nature, with a sensual, seductive side. Embrace the velvety, voluptuous bouquet.

title: Online Only Air & Coconut Water Eau Fraiche
description: Clean Air & Coconut Water Eau Fraiche adds a youthful touch and rebalancing to the Air Eau de Parfum. The overall effect of coconut water on the fragrance adds an element of playfulness while maintaining the original inspiration of a breath of clean, mountain air without loosing the notes of lemon, rose, and musks.Fragrance Notes:Top - Italian bergamot, lemon, cassis fruit; Mid - Coconut nat neo, freesia flower, rose; Dry - Clean air musk, Tonka, solar flower

title: Liquid Cashmere Black Eau de Parfum
description: Indulge in liquid luxury with Donna Karan Liquid Cashmere Black Eau de Parfum. Exposing the passion of a woman. Dark. Alluring. Tantalizing, with notes of ripe black cherry, rich patchouli and smooth praline - a seduction about to unfold.

title: Alien Eau Extraordinaire Eau de Toilette
description: In 2005, Alien, an extraordinary fragrance from elsewhere, revealed a solar goddess bathed in radiant solar energy. Now MUGLER unveils a new glowing revelation...Introducing ALIEN Eau Extraordinaire, a smoldering elixir captured in luminous crystal.An illuminating and intensely feminine Eau de Toilette, Alien Eau Extraordinaire enchants with its sensual freshness, enveloping each woman in an aura of crystalline light. A modern purity, precious and delicate, kisses the skin with positive radiance, evoking a new sun goddess that is both sophisticated and serene. Captured in a brilliant faceted stone, imbued with timeless elegance, Alien Eau Extraordinaire captivates with its glowing tranquility.Click here for store locations

title: Shower Fresh Eau de Parfum
description:
This uplifting and juicy CLEAN scent captures that just stepped out of the shower freshness. Not heavy, overwhelming or pretentious, CLEAN Shower Fresh is citrusy and bright yet subtly sexy. A crisp but understated, quintessential soapy scent.
Top Notes: Lemon, Mandarin & Orange
Mid Notes: Lily of the Valley, Orange Blossom & Jasmine
Base Notes: Musk & Sheer Woods

title: Online Only Blossom Eau de Parfum
description: Clean's Blossom Eau de Parfum is a floral fragrance inspired by a natural spring scattered with freshly fallen petals. Transporting you to a floral escape, feminine and elegant, with notes of Tunisian neroli and sensual sandalwood.Fragrance Notes:Top - Tunisian neroli, seringa petals HP, yellow freesia; Mid - Orange blossom, rain lily HP, Georgia magnolia, blue dianthus; Dry - Skin musk, cotton wood, sensual sandalwood

title: Love Story Eau Sensuelle Eau de Parfum
description: Chloe Love Story Eau Sensuelle Eau de Parfum is blended with sunny, almost vanilla, notes of heliotrope, while the orange blossom is sweeter and more romantic than ever. Its sensuality is sublimated by a sandalwoood accord, velvety and slightly milky, giving depth and an enhanced sensuality to this elegant fragrance. A new olfactory poetry. A new Love Story seen through Chloe's eyes.Fragrance Notes:Top - Orange blossom, primofiore lemon, yuzu and nashi; Middle - Passion flower and heliotrope; Base - Cedar wood, amber and musks

title: Samsara Eau de Toilette
description: Jean-Paul Guerlain created Samsara for the woman of his life. His only indications were sandalwood and jasmine, which the "Lady of Samsara" particularly liked. Jean-Paul Guerlain travelled to India many times to acquire the purest sandalwood and a jasmine used only for religious offerings until then. Samsara is a sensual version of seduction for a woman who has found harmony and balance, which is notably conveyed through the composition's raw materials.Woody Oriental. Harmonious, spellbinding, embracing. As Samsara takes flight, it enwraps us in jasmine flower, which dominates the scent, before sunny ylang-ylang flower embellishes it, the better to unite it with the radiant and generous warmth of sandalwood. Lastly, iris, Tonka bean and vanilla harmonize and render sublime this blend with its remarkable trail.Fragrance Notes:Top - Jasmine; Heart - Ylang Ylang, sandalwood; Dry Down - Iris, Tonka bean, vanilla

title: Pleasures Eau Fraiche Eau de Parfum
description: For the sheer pleasure of it. A lively, modern balance of Estée Lauder pleasures¿ signature Lilies, Peonies, Jasmine, and Baie Rose.

title: Live Colorfully Sunshine Eau de Parfum
description: A lighter weight, extra-refreshing edition of Live Colorfully by Kate Spade New York, which will surprise and delight with its charming sophistication.Fragrance Notes: Layers of mandarin, water lily, musk and Tahitian vanilla dance upon the skin like light on a crystal. A sophisticated (and slightly mischievous) reminder to constantly step into the world of color around you.

title: Dahlia Divin Eau de Toilette
description: Like a haute couture gown, this fragrance envelops you in freshness and sensual softness that reveals the divine within you. Like a custom-made Givenchy creation, Dahlia Divin Eau de Toilette is an exquisitely refined, multi-faceted fragrance. The scent envelopes the skin with a fresh and soft sensuality, and like a golden haute couture gown, leaves you feeling.... divine.Fragrance Notes:Head - Blood-orange, vineyard peach; Heart - Rosy jasmine; Base - Sandalwood, vanilla musks

title: Online Only Aqua Allegoria Herba Fresca Eau de Toilette
description: Green aromatic citrus. Tonic, refreshing, unisex. Aqua Allegoria Herba Fresca is a spontaneous and natural Eau de Toilette, an invitation to walk barefoot in freshly cut grass sparkling with dew. Its pure and refined bottle with a golden mesh celebrates the iconic Guerlain Bee Bottle.Fragrance Notes:Top - Lemon, green note; Middle - Spearmint, Lily of the Valley, cyclamen; Base - Green teaThe Aqua Allegoria are among Guerlain's most emblematic fragrance collections. Their launch in 1999 was a bold gamble. That of taking nature as sole muse and creating a unique olfactory genre: the first collection of eau fraîche in perfumery.

title: Flora by Gucci Glamorous Magnolia Eau de Toilette
description: Glamorous Magnolia celebrates the magnolia in all its guises: radiant freshness, velvet petals and an enduringly feminine sensuality. Glamour is assured.The Glamorous Magnolia woman is spellbinding in her allure. Confident, charismatic, she draws her audience in with a caressing touch. Top notes: Freesia, Green leaves, Citrus zest; Heart notes: Peony, Magnolia; Base notes: Musk, Sandalwood, Warm chocolate accord

title: Ô De L'Orangerie
description: The fruity-floral scent is radiant with a hint of citrus.      Top Notes: Orange zest, Orange Blossom essential oil     Heart Notes: Orange Blossom absolute, Jasmine     Base Notes: Cedar, Benzoin  Ô, the mythical symbol of freshness by Lancôme, is engraved on the front of the bottle and the emblematic roses are engraved on the back.The soft green juice represents the serenity and tranquility of a garden.

title: Omnia Paraiba Eau de Toilette
description:
Joyful. Captivating. Feminine. A colored gemstone that is a tribute to Brazilian femininity, where joy and beauty is a state of mind. A fresh and luscious floral-fruity scent that is inspired by the scents, colors and flavors of Brazil.Fragrance Notes:

Top - Bigarade Orange from Curaçao, maracuja
Heart - Passion flower, gardenia from Brazil
Dry Down - Cocoa beans, vetiver essence.

title: Modern Muse Le Rouge
description: Be daring. Be an inspiration. Experience the fragrance that captures your glamour, your sophistication, your bravado. Estée Lauder Modern Muse Le Rouge is a sexy, provocative contrast of two distinctively different accords-rich roses awakened by ripe fruit, with a seductive velvet crème accord-provide an intriguing dual impression. It's a true innovation in fragrance design, as complex and fascinating as the woman who inspires it.

title: Online Only Warm Cotton & Mandarin Eau Fraiche
description: Clean Warm Cotton is a linear composition of warm aldehydes, delicate florals and sultry musks. The addition of mandarin to illuminates this composition by creating an inviting brightness that compliments the linear aspects of this alluring fragrance.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot, mandarin; Mid - Orange flower, peony, jasmine; Dry - Musks, amber, skin musks

title: Online Only Aqua Allegoria Pera Granita Eau de Toilette
description: Juicy fruity citrus. Fizz, radiant, tangy. Pera Granita is a juicy and cheerful Eau de Toilette, a walk among the garden of the Hesperides. Its pure and refined bottle with a golden mesh celebrates the iconic Guerlain Bee Bottle.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot, grapefruit, lemon; Middle - Osmanthus, pear, orange blossom; Base - White musk, cedarwood, mossThe Aqua Allegoria are among Guerlain's most emblematic fragrance collections. Their launch in 1999 was a bold gamble. That of taking nature as sole muse and creating a unique olfactory genre: the first collection of eau fraîche in perfumery.

title: Angel Comet Eau de Toilette Refillable
description: The uniqueness of Angel by MUGLER was reinterpreted with respect to its original and unique oriental-gourmand heart, bringing to life an addictive scent with the same carnal sensuality, yet more subtly provocative, rounded and finely nuanced. Click here for store locations

title: Premiere Eau de Toilette
description: Gucci Premiere Eau de Toilette is a fresh, sparkling scent that combines presence and sensual femininity, endowing every woman with an unfading radiance.

title: Online Only Pop Electric BABY Eau de Parfum
description: Harajuku Lovers Pop Electric BABY Eau de Parfum is a fragrance created by pop singer and fashion icon, Gwen Stefani. BABY is powder pink, symbolizing adorable silliness and unconditional love. Wear day or night. Pop Art inspired bottle looks great on your dresser or vanity. A powdery vanilla musk.Fragrance Notes:Top - Freesia, bergamot, white rose; Mid - Orange flower, tiare flower, jasmine petals; Base - White musk, soft woods, helitrope, vanilla and violet.

title: Cashmere Aura Eau de Parfum
description: The essence of a woman is what she projects to the world without saying a word. It's an energy, a spirit, an inner glow that emanates from within. Confidently feminine, it's provocatively magnetic, irresistibly unique, powerfully seductive. Drawing you in. Aura. Revealing the light of a woman. Confidently feminine, Cashmere Aura Eau de Parfum is a sparkling blend of delicate florals, sweet citrus and blonde woods.Fragrance Notes:Top - Sparkling aldehydes; Middle - Cassie absolute; Base - Musk

title: Romance Summer Blossom Eau de Parfum
description: Ralph Lauren Romance Summer Blossom Eau de Parfum is the women's fragrance that captures a romantic escape to an idyllic summer getaway where true love blossoms. Discover the succulent notes of vibrant guava, exotic ylang ylang, and sensual musk.Fragrance Notes:Top - Mandarin essence, guava, lychee accord; Middle - Ylang ylang, coconut water, orange flower absolute; Base - Benzoin, heliotrope accord, musk

title: Goldea, The Roman Night Eau de Parfum
description: A sensual Eau de Parfum that pays tribute to the fascinating, Eternal City of Rome at night. A contemporary fragrance with mesmerizing black musks and tantalizing nocturnal flowers. This floral musky chypre fragrance is a charismatic, fascinating and seductive parfum that unleashes every woman's irresistible aura.Fragrance Notes:Top - Luscious mulberry, black peony. Fruity, sparkling, addictive. Delectable flavor of luscious ripe berries with an unexpected floral energy; Heart - Blooming jasmine, tuberose absolute. Floral, spicy, mysterious. Nocturnal while blossoms add their radiance to the hypnotic character of the fragrance; Base - Black musk, patchouli heart and vetiver. Enveloping, luminous, woody, sensual. Musk cloaked in black textured wood adds feminine and strength

title: Live Irrésistible Eau de Toilette
description: This girl seizes the moment! She makes her own luck and rewrites all the rules, leaving just one: Live Irrésistible. A mantra she carries with her every day, with a light and fresh attitude that challenges all women to live life irresistibly.The refreshing sweetness of a crisp pear blends with the vivacity of a juicy raspberry. The tangy freshness of these fruits instantly puts a smile on her face. She sees the world through rose-tinted glasses thanks to the airy petals of rose. Allspice berries ignite sensual musks and woody notes in an explosive finale. The couture inspired bottle is fresh and effervescent, adorned with light pink studs and a bright pink label that remind you to Live Irrésistible. A floral fruity fragrance.Fragrance Notes:Top - Pear, crispy green apple and acidulous raspberry; Heart - Rose and pimento berry; Base - Powdery musks and light woods

title: L'Eau D'Issey Natural Travel Spray
description: L'Eau d'Issey awakens a feeling of total beauty. L'Eau d'Issey is a pure floral with musky and woody tones. A very complex fragrance, the Eau de Toilette is made up of a wide range of floral scents including lotus, cyclamen, freesia, carnations, and white lilies, with hints of amberseed and musk.

catalogs: Fragrance, Women's Fragrance, Body Mist & Hair Mist
title: Online Only Sofia Isabel Fragrance Mist
description: DefineMe Sofia Isabel is a free-spirit who embraces life with confidence. Intoxicating. Youthful. Free-Spirited.Inspiration: Wear it out to a concert or just on a casual day with friends. xoBenefits:Blendable with other DefineMe Fragrance Mists + Fragrance Oils; Made with fresh fragrance, organic alcohol derived from sugarcane + fractionated coconut oil; Cruelty-free + vegan; Fine mist spray applicatorFragrance Notes: Mandarin, black currant, jasmine + sugarEvery bottle of DefineMe Fragrance represents mold-breaking, barrier-crushing women that speak to different qualities they strive for: being confident, creative, strong, free-spirited, loving, passionate + fearless.For every bottle purchased DefineMe Fragrance gives $1 to educational scholarships for girls in low-income countries.It's Not Just A Fragrance / It's A Movement

title: Armani Code Cashmere Eau de Parfum
description: Explore the warm and enveloping scent as the softest fabric, Armani Code Cashmere is a dense mosaic of contrast. The silage is unfailingly illumined by glowing, ever-present orange blossom notes, accentuated by sambac jasmine. Unforgettable, supremely sensual, it forms an accord with heliotrope and iris notes. The color is deep purple glistening with pink, mysterious shades for a scent that goes from floral fragrant touches to a nearly animal accord of leather, suede, and frankincense.Armani Code Cashmere is the most intense dress code of the Armani Code collection. A fragrance that captures a love story told by two perfumers, Dominique Ropion and Carlos Benaïm (IFF). A tale of trust and comfort, warmed by a delicious almond-milk accord, a deep olfactory pool of pleasure.

title: Online Only Aqua Allegoria Mandarine Basilic Eau de Toilette
description: Aromatic citrus. Sparkling, radiant, luminous. Aqua Allegoria Mandarine Basilic is a sparkling and cheerful Eau de Toilette, a singular duo steeped in grace and lightness. Its pure and refined bottle with a golden mesh celebrates the iconic Guerlain Bee Bottle.Fragrance Notes:Top - Mandarin, lemon, orange; Middle - Basil, blackcurrant, orange blossom absolute; Base - Green tea, cedarwoodThe Aqua Allegoria are among Guerlain's most emblematic fragrance collections. Their launch in 1999 was a bold gamble. That of taking nature as sole muse and creating a unique olfactory genre: the first collection of eau fraîche in perfumery.

title: Online Only Angel Eau de Parfum with Bonus Bracelet
description: Indulge in Angel fragrance and MUGLER fashion with the Angel Eau de Parfum Spray with Bonus Bracelet! Included in this purchase of a Shooting Star is a chic silver Mugler cuff bracelet. A stylish and luxurious treat to adorn the wrist of any Angel Diva!Set Includes:Eau de Parfum Refillable Shooting Star Spray (1.7 oz.); Signature Silver Cuff Bracelet

title: Armani Code Satin Eau de Parfum
description: Armani Code Satin is a daring opulence captured by Giorgio Armani that celebrates a femininity textured with sweet notes. A contemporary women's fragrance, it reimagines the playfulness of the original Eau de Parfum to create youthful exuberance.A "Tasty Floriental", this perfume is lusciously addictive. Making a memorable first impression, top notes of sweet orange essence sparkle with ginger and a pear sorbet accord. New and beautifully luminous, the neroli essence is exclusive to Code Satin.

title: My Burberry Eau de Toilette
description: Burberry's My Burberry Eau de Toilette is a new cheerful and radiant floral interpretation of the original scent: Reminiscent of a bright, spring blossom garden in London.Fragrance Notes:Top: sweet pea, lemon flower fused with peonies, peach flower; Heart: freesia; Base: rain - tipped damask roses, white moss, a touch of musk

title: Ô De Lancôme Eau de Toilette Spray
description: An emblematic fresh-citrus fragrance originally created in 1969, Ô De Lancôme is a sparkling flurry of citrus and flowers that delivers a fresh, clean scent that evokes spontaneity.      Top Notes: Bergamot, Lemon, Mandarin     Heart Notes: Basil, Rosemary, Coriander, Jasmine, Honeysuckle     Base Notes: Oak Moss, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Patchouli  Ô, the mythical symbol of freshness by Lancôme, is engraved on the front of the bottle and the emblematic roses are engraved on the back. The luminous pale-green juice dipicts the fresh, clean scent that is encapsulated in the modern bottle.

title: Online Only Cool Cotton & Grapefruit Eau Fraiche
description: Clean Cool Cotton & Grapefruit Eau Fraiche takes the original fragrance to a new fresh level with the marriage of muguet and jasmine petals; adding layers of floralcy that are made effortlessly fresh by watermelon and grapefruit. Honey in the dry down makes the fragrance sweet but is fully balanced by musks and cedarwoods. The freshness of Cool Cotton Eau de Parfum is intensified thanks to bursting grapefruit which perfectly mimics a juicy, vine picked zestful grapefruit. This unique combination of "sun-dried linens" and citrus plays out beautifully on skin.Fragrance Notes:Top - Magnolia leaves, watermelon, grapefruit; Mid - Linden blossom, jasmine petals, muguet; Dry - Musk, honey, cedarwood

title: Youth Dew Eau de Parfum Spray in Classic Bottle
description: Absolutely captivating, with opulent flowers, rich spices, precious woods.  In 1953, Estée Lauder introduced Youth-Dew as a scented bath oil that doubled as a perfume--and the world of fragrance was forever changed. Until then, women had relied on the men in their lives to give them perfume as a special gift. But Youth-Dew was created for women to buy for themselves...and they did.  Even today, its captivating, sexy spiciness ensures that this true classic remains a favorite.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Rose, jonquil, lavender     Middle - Jasmine, muguet, spices     Base - Moss, vetiver, patchouli

title: Online Only Azurée Eau de Parfum
description: Azurée Eau de Parfum by Estée Lauder is the sunlit fragrance. Radiant and sparkly, balancing a vibrant tang of citrus and earthy richness. The feeling is light and sunlit, with a rich warmth.  Fragrance Notes:      Top Notes - Basil, jasmine, citrus     Middle Notes - Armoise, vetiver, rose     Base Notes - Patchouli, moss, amber

title: Dahlia Divin Nude Eau de Parfum
description: Dahlia Divin Eau de Parfum Nude is a dazzling and luminous floral fruity musky fragrance. As caressing as a divinely scented breeze, this pure and delicate perfume heightens the skin's own natural and very personal trail.The combination of orange blossom tea with apricot pulp imparts a crystalline freshness and tangy sweetness to the airy-light floral heart composed of sambac jasmine, rose and osmanthus. The leathery-apricoty tones of this flower trio harmonize in the background with radiant blond woods and carnal white musk for an olfactory signature that enhances the sensuality of the woman wearing it. The bottle's refined lines and its precious details enclose this ultra-sensorial skin perfume signed by Givenchy.Fragrance Notes: Orangle blossom, sambac jasmine, white woods

title: Eau Parfumée au thé bleu
description: Precious blue tea from China's Fujian province grows high on mountainsides wrapped in cooling mists. Bvlgari has captured the aromatic harmony of these treasured Oolong leaves in Eau Parfumée au thé bleu, an airy fragrance as revivifying as the pure oxygen of high altitudes - as inspiring as the infinite blue of a clear, untroubled sky.Fragrance Notes:Top: lavender, shiso leaves, pure, natural aromatic freshness; Heart: blue tea accord, violet, delicate, deep, floral nuances; Base: iris, musk

title: Online Only Aqua Allegoria Pamplelune Eau de Toilette
description: Fruity citrus. Energizing, sparkling, sensual. Aqua Allegoria Pamplelune is a sparkling and sensual Eau de Toilette, a cheerful breeze over a radiant and tangy grapefruit. Its pure and refined bottle with a golden mesh celebrates the iconic Guerlain Bee Bottle.Fragrance Notes:Top - Lemon, grapefruit, bergamot; Middle - Blackcurrant bud, petitgrain; Base - Patchouli, vanillaThe Aqua Allegoria are among Guerlain's most emblematic fragrance collections. Their launch in 1999 was a bold gamble. That of taking nature as sole muse and creating a unique olfactory genre: the first collection of eau fraîche in perfumery.

title: Online Only Aliage Sport Eau de Parfum
description: The very first "sports fragrance." Fresh, green notes and cool citrus. Exuberant, engaging and brimming with energy, Aliage Sport Eau de Parfum by Estée Lauder celebrates a new femininity.  Fragrance Notes:      Top Notes - Jasmine, citrus     Middle Notes - Nutmeg, rose, armoise     Base Notes - Oakmoss, vetiver, cedarwood

title: Online Only Wild Fire Eau de Parfum
