description: Unlock Wild Fire, a seductive, warm, sensual fragrance, blending premium wild-harvested Australian sandalwood with the soft floral notes of ylang ylang, jasmine petals and spice, emulating the intoxicating scent of the desert during the intense heat of summer-the dry air tingles as wild fires threaten.The mission at Raw Spirit is to create unique luxury fragrances using rare and unusual ingredients from around the world. Raw Spirit also believes in giving back to communities in the regions that they've been inspired by - $1 from every purchase of Wild Fire goes to Desert Feet Tour, an organization that uses the arts to create educational and musical opportunities in remote Australian Aboriginal communities.Fragrance Notes:Top - Jasmine; Middle - Ylang ylang; Bottom - Australian sandalwood, cedarwood, musk, amber

title: Online Only Warm Cashmere Eau de Parfum
description: The smoothness of fig mixed with sweet crispness of cassis brings you back to the simple moments of comfort layering with cashmere on a crisp fall day. Warm Cashmere Eau de Parfum by Clean features notes of bergamot, cassis, orris, and cedarwood.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot, blood orange, cassis; Middle - African orchid, orris; Base - Vetiver Haiti, cedarwood, musk

title: Online Only Intuition Eau de Parfum
description: The essence of a woman. A luminous, sensuous fragrance, Intuition is a modern interpretation of classic oriental richness. From the precious heart of rich, golden Amber, the fragrance unfolds on your skin with warmth, femininity and sensuality.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Bergamot, mandarin, fresh green garden notes     Middle - Rose double delight, gardenia petals, freesia     Base - Amber, warm-skin accord, precious woods

title: Cotton Eau de Toilette
description: Reminiscent of cleanliness and comfort, Marc Jacobs Cotton Eau de Toilette spray captures the ease and simplicity of summer, in a bottle.  Fragrance Notes:      Top - Peach, mandarin, bergamot, aquatic accord     Heart - Lavender, jasmine, cotton accord, Lily of the Valley     Base - White suede, blonde woods, musk

title: Online Only Pop Electric MUSIC Eau de Parfum
description: Harajuku Lovers Pop Electric MUSIC Eau de Parfum is a fragrance created by pop singer and fashion icon, Gwen Stefani. MUSIC is purple representing creativity and uniqueness. Wear day or night. Pop Art inspired bottle looks great on your dresser or vanity. A vibrant fresh floral.Fragrance Notes:Top - Crisp apple, water lily, crushed berries; Mid - Dewy freesia, pink peony, jasmine petals; Base - Sun-drenched woods, musks, amberwood

title: Online Only Summer Rain Eau de Parfum
description: Unlock Summer Rain, a fresh and invigorating fragrance blending a citrus bouquet of lime and grapefruit with a burst of orange flower, anchored in a base of vetiver and cedarwood, capturing that distinct feeling when summer rain begins, quickly cooling the earth and reviving your spirit.Raw Spirit creates unique luxury fragrances using rare and unusual ingredients from around the world. Summer Rain is inspired by the rhythmic summer storms on the Seminole Lands in the Florida Everglades, when the air is thick with humidity as the storm clouds build. As soon as the summer rain starts, you feel the earth's instant relief.Raw Spirit also believes in giving back to communities in the regions that they've been inspired by - $1 from every purchase of Summer Rain goes to the Chumash Indian Museum in Thousand Oaks, CA, to support their Native American cultural education programs.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot, kaffir lime, basil, grapefruit; Middle - Orange flower, mint, jasmine; Bottom - Haitian vetiver, moss, cedarwood

title: Liquid Cashmere White Eau de Parfum
description: Indulge in liquid luxury with Donna Karan Liquid Cashmere White Eau de Parfum. Illuminating the spirit of a woman. Renewing. Airy. Radiant, with notes of sparkling bergamot, sensual osmanthus, and creamy vanilla and musk - alive with freedom of movement.

title: Alien Eau Sublime Eau de Toilette
description: From the Alien universe arises a dazzling fragrance that makes every woman feel sublime. A solar revelation, it brings a fulfilling sensation of awakening and wellbeing. A symbol of empowerment and serenity.Fragrance Notes: Mandarine, orange, galbanum, jasmine, tiare flower, heliotrope, cashmeran wood, white amberClick here for store locations

title: Guilty EAU
description: A smooth and light interpretation of the classic Guilty women's fragrances, Gucci Guilty EAU breaks with the tradition of sparkling, cool eau de toilettes, conveying a more delicate, romantic attitude.  Subtly opens with a warm aquatic accord and sweet lychee. There is a milky and delicate heart of lilac, the floral signature of the original, now tinged with wild strawberry, while the musk base emulates the sultriness of bare skin.

title: Flora by Gucci Gracious Tuberose Eau de Toilette
description: Gracious Tuberose embraces all aspects of the flower’s loveliness: its fresh green shoots, dew-sprinkled petals and lingering scent. The effect is the most gracious aura. The Gracious Tuberose woman boasts a natural poise. She dances through life with a ballerina’s elegance and her presence is a joy for those around her.Top notes: Violet leaves, Peach; Heart notes: Tuberose, Orange Flower, Rose; Base notes: Cistus (Rock Rose), White Cedarwood

title: Online Only Pop Electric LOVE Eau de Parfum
description: Harajuku Lovers Pop Electric LOVE Eau de Parfum is a fragrance created by pop singer and fashion icon, Gwen Stefani. LOVE is hot pink, symbolizing harmony and balance. Wear day or night. description: Can't get enough of Coconut? Get a fix of your favorite tropical scent in an eau de toilette format.      Eau de toilette     Light and wearable     Tropical, creamy scent     Contains coconut extract.

description: Coming Soon 9-24!Inspired by the unapologetically feminine color pink, this passionate, playful and loving color is about taking a chance. title: Online Only Always Red Femme Eau de Toilette
description: This intriguing, feminine and dynamic interpretation of Always Red is a spirited and sensual floral expression of the woman who sets the New York City pace. As the metropolis calls, she responds... it's all or nothing. Inspired by her, the daring textures of lace and leather combine with the dramatic contrasts and provocative parallels of the city to create this perfect blend of blackcurrant bud, peach blossom, moss and patchouli... the paradigm of today's confident woman.

title: Online Only Mystic Pearl Eau de Parfum
description: Unlock Mystic Pearl, a luminous, floral fragrance blending the refreshing scent from real pearls mingled with notes of tropical white flowers, a hint of coconut, and the irresistible tropical spices cinnamon and clove, transporting you directly to the shores of the mystical island of Bali.The mission at Raw Spirit is to create unique luxury fragrances using rare and unusual ingredients from around the world. Mystic Pearl is inspired by evening on the exotic Balinese beaches, when  the salty, cool air from the deep blue sea mingles with the scent of nearby frangipani trees and incense. Raw Spirit also believes in giving back to communities in the regions that they've been inspired by - $1 from every purchase of Mystic Pearl goes to the Benih Kasih Orphanage in northern Bali.Fragrance Notes:Top - Pearl; Middle - Jasmine, frangipani; Bottom - Cinnamon, coconut, clove

title: Ô D'Azur Eau de Toilette
description: The fruity-floral scent captures the feeling of relaxed sensuality on a late summer afternoon where the warm golden sand is complimented by the sparkling blue ocean.      Top Notes: icilian Bergamot, Calabria Lemon essence     Heart Notes: Rose, Peony     Base Notes: Modern woody notes, Musk Ô, the mythical symbol of freshness by Lancôme, is engraved on the front of the bottle and the emblematic roses are engraved on the back. The glistening golden fragrance is reminiscent of sunlight that is encapsulated in the modern bottle.

title: Gold Collection White Luminous Gold Eau de Parfum
description: To Michael Kors, nothing is more alluring than the rich indulgences of Gold. The ultimate symbol of luxury and glamour. The Gold Collection - three individual fragrances destined to shine in fabulous White Luminous Gold, 24K Brilliant Gold and Rose Radiant Gold.  Sparkling and sensuous. White Luminous Gold Eau de Parfum is an intoxicating burst of pear, jasmine and amber in a bright and exotic signature.

description: A mythical fragrance, first opus of the collection. Green Water is timeless and elegant freshness, revisited over the years. In 2016, Parfums Jacques Fath with the fine sensibility of Cecile Zarokian, rehabilitated noble ingredients such as large quantities of neroli into this complex scent.Fragrance Notes:Top - Neroli, bergamot, mandarin, orange; Mid - Basil, tarragon, mint, clove, caraway seeds; Base - Vetyver, oak moss, grey amber infusion, musks

title: Online Only Bel Ambre Eau de Parfum
description: A woody amber composition, signature of an intense fragrance. But Bel Ambre Eau de Parfum is more than just Amber: it is a tale to be told for who wears it, a tale of mystery and attraction. Rare are those who will resist the many facets of this scent.Fragrance Notes:Top - Juniper berries, black pepper, bergamot, lemon; Mid - White flowers, orris butter, caraway seeds; Base - Vetyver, amber, leather, musks

title: Satsuma Eau De Toilette
description: Can't get enough of Satsuma? Get a fix of your favorite zingy scent in the 30ml Satsuma Eau De Toilette format by The Body Shop.  light and wearable  Zingy energising scent  Contains satsuma extract

title: Online Only Untold Eau de Parfum Spray
description: Whether it's dreams she has yet to share, secrets she has yet to reveal, or ambitions she has yet to declare, Untold was designed to embody the many facets of the modern woman. With sparkling and fruity top notes, a radiant floral heart and a mysterious and addictive warmth, this fragrance captures all that a woman is.Top Notes: The fragrance opens with the bold vibrancy of pink pepper combined with the freshness of a burst of juicy blackcurrant and luscious Raspberry.; Mid Notes: The Gardenia, lush Peony and velvety Jasmine form a unique, floral impression that is a statement of modern femininity.; Base Notes: Whispers of rich Patchouli Heart LMR and creamy Sandalwood are wrapped in sensual Musk to create a seductive veil of irresistible warmth.

title: Capri Eau de Parfum
description: An invigorating citrus blend washes over a floral bouquet of peach blossom and violet flower to reveal a rich mixture of musk and vanilla. Like a cool breeze off the Mediterranean Sea, Capri Vince Camuto will transport your senses. This floral fruity fragrance speaks to the serendipity of finding the place in the world where you are free to be your best self.

Live Irrésistible, a spicy fruity floral. Just like her, it is sweet and has plenty of spice! The sweet scents of gourmand pineapple, the delicacy of soft rose petals, the unique boldness of all spice berries, the sensual warmth of amber and musks...Live Irrésistible is a unique cocktail of flowers, fruits and spices, for a fragrance that gives life the scent of whimsy. A surprising Eau de Parfum with a feisty character encased in a couture inspired bottle with shimmering reflections of pink studs! Fruity floral, fizzy and spicy.Fragrance Notes:Top - Juicy pineapple; Heart - Spicy rose; Base - Amber accord

title: La vie est Belle Eau de Parfum Intense
description: Lancôme's La vie est Belle Eau de Parfum Intense is a floral gourmand fragrance with a warm and delicate touch. Inspired by a famous French desert made of cream and hazelnuts, Eau de Parfum Intense reflects the irresistible mix of sophistication, elegance and femininity for a new interpretation of the signature La vie est Belle scent. A bouquet of fresh tuberose is combined with a sweet gourmand blend and hazlenuts, creating the first tasty tuberose. An addictive scent for women with irresistible seductive powers. Eau de Parfum floral aromatic.Fragrance Notes:Top - Star anise; Heart - Bouquet of roses; Base - Patchouli - vanilla

title: Paris Eau de Toilette
description: A light floral fragrance with a subtle sensuality. The top notes of rose, orange flower, and mimosa are balanced by sexy base notes of amber, sandalwood, and oakmoss.

description: Estée Lauder Pleasures Floral is as joyous as a profusion of Spring flowers. Sparkling floral blooms of honeysuckle, jasmine and waterlily brightened with juicy mandarin. Finished in creamy woods and musk, like petals on the skin.

description: Adventure. Romance. Discovery. Wonderlust Eau de Parfum for women by Michael Kors is all about the journey. La vie est Belle is the fragrance of joyful femininity and happiness. The fragrance that makes life more beautiful. Now available in a rollerball.  "La vie est belle", a French expression meaning "Life is beautiful"; the manifesto of a new era. Universal yet personal, Lancôme's femininity is a choice embraced by women, not an imposed standard. The choice to live one's life and fill it with beauty. Your own way.  La vie est belle introduces a new olfactive story, the first ever iris gourmand. The juice is made with the most precious natural ingredients, a modern interpretation of an oriental fragrance with a twist of gourmand. title: Online Only Summer Rain Eau de Parfum Rollerball
description: Unlock Summer Rain, a fresh and invigorating fragrance blending a citrus bouquet of lime and grapefruit with a burst of orange flower, anchored in a base of vetiver and cedarwood, capturing that distinct feeling when summer rain begins, quickly cooling the earth and reviving your spirit.Raw Spirit creates unique luxury fragrances using rare and unusual ingredients from around the world. Summer Rain is inspired by the rhythmic summer storms on the Seminole Lands in the Florida Everglades, when the air is thick with humidity as the storm clouds build. As soon as the summer rain starts, you feel the earth's instant relief.Raw Spirit also believes in giving back to communities in the regions that they've been inspired by - $1 from every purchase of Summer Rain goes to the Chumash Indian Museum in Thousand Oaks, CA, to support their Native American cultural education programs.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot, kaffir lime, basil, grapefruit; Middle - Orange flower, mint, jasmine; Bottom - Haitian vetiver, moss, cedarwood

description: She's irreverent and unconventional with an intense and playful sensuality that makes her unforgettable. She is bold and fearless. Her fragrance declaration is: I Am Juicy Couture.I Am Juicy Couture combines ripe, juicy fruits to open this bold and alluring scent before blending a seductive mixture of gardenia and cashmere woods. The fragrance opens with the biting succulence of bursting raspberry, freshly tart pomelo and lush passion fruit. In the heart, a narcotic temptation of gardenia, heliotrope, dreamy rose de Mai and sensual sweet pea combine. It finishes with an addictive luxuriousness of soft musks, warm cashmere woods and candied amber.

description: Unlock Desert Blush, an intoxicating floral fragrance blending the exotic, fruity note of Australian boronia flower with the warmth of sandalwood, emulating the sweet aroma of the desert at sunset. The opening sweet burst of boronia dries down to warm, mellow notes of sandalwood.Raw Spirit creates unique luxury fragrances using rare and unusual ingredients from around the world. Desert Blush is inspired by the West Australian desert skies at sunset. The harsh light of the day fades as dusk falls and the red soils turn a deep pink and the sky is flecked with streaks of pink and gray, a magical time when you can feel the earth exhale.Raw Spirit also believes in giving back to communities in the regions that they've been inspired by - $1 from every purchase of Desert Blush goes to Desert Feet Tour, an organization that uses the arts to create educational and musical opportunities in remote Australian Aboriginal communities.Fragrance Notes:Top - Osmanthus, jasmine, violet; Middle - Australian boronia, ylang ylang; Bottom - Australian sandalwood, cedarwood, musk

description: A passion for colored gemstones inspires Bvlgari to create magnificent jewels distinguished by splendid color harmonies. title: Dolce Eau de Parfum Fragrance Spray Pen
description: Dolce is a gentle, feminine mix of white flowers, introduced by the freshness of the Neroli leaves and defined by the White Amaryllis, a South African flower used for the first time ever in scent.  A unique and opulent combination of White Water Lily and bold White Daffodil blend perfectly with the full-bodied White Amaryllis. Dolce's elegant packaging is reminiscent of a vintage fragrance flacon. The flower stopper pays tribute to Sicilian customs and a thin black grosgrain ribbon, presented in an elegant bow, conjures images of the white shirts and bow-ties that were a signature of early Dolce & Gabbana catwalk shows.  The final, and most personal, touch: Dolce signed in a flourish of black script, a replica of Domenico Dolce's father's own signature.  Notes:      Top notes: Neroli leaves, Papaya flower     Heart notes: White Amaryllis, White Daffodil, White Water Lily     Dry down notes: Cashmeran, Musky notes, Sandalwood

title: La vie est Belle Body Lotion
description: "La vie est belle", a French expression meaning "Life is beautiful"; the manifesto of a new era. Universal yet personal, Lancôme's femininity is a choice embraced by women, not an imposed standard. The choice to live one's life and fill it with beauty. Your own way. La vie est belle introduces a new olfactive story, the first ever iris gourmand. The juice is made with the most precious natural ingredients, a modern interpretation of an oriental fragrance with a twist of gourmand. It entwines the elegance of iris with the strength of Patchouli and the sweetness of a gourmand blend; for an incredible scent with depth and complexity.        Top Note: The elegance of Iris becomes the backbone of the fragrance. It blossoms from the first to the last note like never before     Middle Note: The strength of Patchouli gives strength and depth     Base Note: A sweet gourmand adds a burst of unexpected radiance   (6.7 oz.)

title: I Am Juicy Couture Body Lotion
description: She's irreverent and unconventional with an intense and playful sensuality that makes her unforgettable. She is bold and fearless. Her fragrance declaration is: I Am Juicy Couture.I Am Juicy Couture combines ripe, juicy fruits to open this bold and alluring scent before blending a seductive mixture of gardenia and cashmere woods. The fragrance opens with the biting succulence of bursting raspberry, freshly tart pomelo and lush passion fruit. In the heart, a narcotic temptation of gardenia, heliotrope, dreamy rose de Mai and sensual sweet pea combine. It finishes with an addictive luxuriousness of soft musks, warm cashmere woods and candied amber.(6.8 oz.)

title: Online Only Dolce Body Lotion
description: Dolce is a gentle, feminine mix of white flowers, introduced by the freshness of the Neroli leaves and defined by the White Amaryllis, a South African flower used for the first time ever in scent.A unique and opulent combination of White Water Lily and bold White Daffodil blend perfectly with the full-bodied White Amaryllis.Dolce's elegant packaging is reminiscent of a vintage fragrance flacon. The flower stopper pays tribute to Sicilian customs and a thin black grosgrain ribbon, presented in an elegant bow, conjures images of the white shirts and bow-ties that were a signature of early Dolce & Gabbana catwalk shows.The final, and most personal, touch: Dolce signed in a flourish of black script, a replica of Domenico Dolce's father's own signature.Notes:Top notes: Neroli leaves, Papaya flower; Heart notes: White Amaryllis, White Daffodil, White Water Lily; Dry down notes: Cashmeran, Musky notes, Sandalwood

Like the sunshine pouring down from the sky, be dazzled by its base -- a soft finale of heliotrope and ambrette seed. An invitation to watch mimosas dance summer away.

description: Wrap yourself in sunny memories. Sink your toes deep into the sand and breathe in the salty air as the surf invites you to jump in and wash your cares away. Enjoy this moment of pure freedom and joy-let this simple pleasure fill your heart with warmth and grace. Revel in the salty surf with this softening cleanser that leaves skin and hair feeling hydrated and conditioned with a healthy look. Infuses hair and body with the subtle beachy scent of Pure Grace Summer Surf.

title: Youth Dew Dusting Powder Box
description: Absolutely captivating, with opulent flowers, rich spices, precious woods. In 1953, Estée Lauder introduced Youth-Dew as a scented bath oil that doubled as a perfume--and the world of fragrance was forever changed. Until then, women had relied on the men in their lives to give them perfume as a special gift. But Youth-Dew was created for women to buy for themselves...and they did. Even today, its captivating, sexy spiciness ensures that this true classic remains a favorite.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Shower Gel & Body Wash
title: La vie est Belle Shower Gel
description: "La vie est belle", a French expression meaning "Life is beautiful"; the manifesto of a new era. Universal yet personal, Lancôme's femininity is a choice embraced by women, not an imposed standard. The choice to live one's life and fill it with beauty. Your own way.  La vie est belle introduces a new olfactive story, the first ever iris gourmand. The juice is made with the most precious natural ingredients, a modern interpretation of an oriental fragrance with a twist of gourmand. It entwines the elegance of iris with the strength of Patchouli and the sweetness of a gourmand blend; for an incredible scent with depth and complexity.        Top Note: The elegance of Iris becomes the backbone of the fragrance. It blossoms from the first to the last note like never before     Middle Note: The strength of Patchouli gives strength and depth     Base Note: A sweet gourmand adds a burst of unexpected radiance (6.7 oz.)

title: Shalimar Perfumed Dusting Powder
description: Shalimar Perfumed Dusting Powder by Guerlain is a fragrance to excite and express desire. Light and silky, the powder leaves your skin smooth, comfortable and richly scented. Inspired by the passionate love story between an emperor and an Indian princess, Shalimar, which means "temple of love" in Sanskrit, symbolizes the promise of eternal love forevermore. It is a fragrance of desire. With its smoldering and slightly impertinent character, the star oriental fragrance in perfumery embodies skin-caressing sensuality with a hint of the forbidden. "Wearing Shalimar means letting your senses take over" - Jacques Guerlain.Oriental. Voluptuous, sensual, spellbinding. A flight of flowers and bergamot whips up the top notes with a breeze of freshness. The heart is warmed by enveloping and delicately powdery notes of iris, jasmine and rose. To conclude, the presence of vanilla, rounded balmy notes and the gourmand warmth of Tonka bean orchestrate a sensual symphony for the dry-down.Fragrance Notes:Top - Bergamot; Heart - Iris, jasmine, rose; Dry Down - Vanilla, Tonka bean

description: Bamboo Shower Gel features Gucci's Bamboo scent which emanates the Gucci woman's diverse sides: her femininity, confidence, savvy and strength. The fragrance represents her essence. Soft and intense at once, Gucci Bamboo's sensorial composition draws its inspiration from the Gucci woman's harmonious dichotomy. Natural and resonant ingredients create a captivating olfactory story. Woody and warm notes vibrate through the heart and base. Deep sandalwood, heady Tahitian vanilla and unique grey amber accords strike a complementary contrast with the inherent femininity found in exotic floral notes of soft casablanca lily, feminine orange blossom and delicate ylang ylang.

title: Online Only Angel Perfuming Body Powder-Jar
description: Complete your Angel ritual with unequaled glamour! The Angel Perfuming Body Powder by MUGLER will illuminate your skin with a subtle and sparkling layer of stardust.

title: Online Only Angel Perfuming Roll-On Deodorant
description: Be adorned in Angel with the Angel Perfuming Roll-on Deodorant by MUGLER. It will create a comfortable feeling of softness and confidence that will last all day.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Shower Gel & Body Wash
title: Trésor Perfumed Shower Gel
description: Trésor begins with notes of apricot, peach, pineapple and bergamot. Mid notes of rose, heliotrope, jasmine and orris give way to sensual base notes of musk, sandalwood and vanilla.(6.7 oz.)

title: Beauty Hack Myrrh Fragrance Oil
description: SheaMoisture's Beauty Hack Frankincense & Myrrh Aroma therapeutic Fragrance Oil transcends the body and mind. It adds a rich and earthy scent to any Beauty Hack recipe. In three simples steps, customize your beauty blend with as many benefits or scents you desire. Take a few scoops of your base, blend in the pure oil(s) of your choice, and add a few drops of your favorite Beauty Hack scent. Add a good-for-you ingredient from your kitchen to kick it up a notch. Discover your perfect mix for face, skin or hair. Go to SheaMoisture.com for more recipes.SheaMoisture's Story: Sofi Tucker started selling Shea Nuts at the village market in Bonthe, Sierra Leone in 1912. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling Shea Butter, African Black Soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was the Grandmother and SheaMoisture is her legacy. With this purchase you help empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future. Ethically Traded Ingredients Sustainably Produced. Pioneering Community Commerce and Fair Trade Since 1912.Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals.

description: A delightful cream deodorant infused with white tea extract, sea breeze accord, madras wood and a trio of tranquility musks. Leaves underarms lightly scented and feeling soft and smooth.

title: Online Only White Tea Pure Indulgence Bath and Shower Gel
description: Lavish in a luxurious indulgence that allows you to revel in the simple pleasure that accompanies the first sip of tea. Let this delightful formula immerse you in a warm memory as it washes away impurities leaving skin cleansed, refreshed and lightly scented with white tea vapors, madras wood and a trio of tranquility musks.

title: Online Only Love Relentlessly Bath & Shower Gel
description: A foaming wash that leaves skin clean and lightly scented; the fragrance is inspired by the love story of Tory Burch's parents. Love Relentlessly captures that euphoric feeling of falling in love. A sparkling mix: fiery pink pepper and patchouli fuse with dewy rose and addictive amber. This irresistible scent is like a love letter.

catalogs: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Shower Gel & Body Wash
title: Walk On Air Shower Cream
description: Lather up with a sweet and tender blend of white florals to caress your skin with a breath of fresh air. The Walk On Air Shower Cream by Kate Spade New York gently cleanses and leaves a nourishing, subtle note of lily of the valley-the flower of happiness and joy-magnolia and crinum lily that lingers long after the steam clears and invites you to seize the day and envelop yourself in the promise of something wonderful. Perfect for layering with the Walk On Air Eau de Parfum and Body Lotion.

title: Beauty Hack Lemongrass Fragrance Oil
description: SheaMoisture's Beauty Hack Lemongrass Aroma therapeutic Fragrance Oil is refreshing and uplifting to the body and mind. It adds a revitalizing and fresh scent to any Beauty Hack recipe. In three simples steps, customize your beauty blend with as many benefits or scents you desire. Take a few scoops of your base, blend in the pure oil(s) of your choice, and add a few drops of your favorite Beauty Hack scent. Add a good-for-you ingredient from your kitchen to kick it up a notch.
